Se acerca la temporada escolar, es por esta razón que ella está solicitando el financiamiento para comprar lapiceros, cuadernos, reglas, borrador, mochila, falda escolar, etc. ya que ella estima que con el crédito podrá comprar  todo los útiles escolares que necesita para esta temporada, con el objetivo de hacer crecer su negocio para tener ingresos extras y poder mantener su negocio estable y rentable.
texts.en:
Cándida, 50 years old, is originally from Chontales, but currently lives in Managua. She is married and a mother to 4 children, all independent, and is a merchant by trade. She sells a variety of merchandise. She started in business 18 years ago selling various products using her own capital, money she had saved. In this way, she was able to establish her own business selling various products such as soft drinks, bread, juice, milk, toilet paper, and soap. She is satisfied with it because she has succeeded in increasing her sales. In this way, she has been able to move forward with the earnings that her business generates daily. Her daughter helps her with the business. Her expectation is to expand the business with various merchandise that she does not already have in her inventory.

The school season is approaching, and this is why she is asking for the loan to buy pencils, notebooks, rulers, erasers, backpacks, school uniform skirts, etc. She thinks that with the loan she will be able to buy all the school supplies she needs for this season, with the goal of making her business grow in order to have extra earnings and to be able to keep her business stable and profitable.

loans.use: to buy pencils, notebooks, rulers, erasers, backpacks, school uniform skirts, etc.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is 35 years old and married with four children. She comes from Sambweni Mombasa and all of her children are still in school. She works very hard to provide for her family. She has always worked and strives to reach her goals and objectives. She owns a motorbike which she operates as a boda boda (a bicycle taxi). She has been in this business for five years and this has allowed her to increase her customers to a reasonable number. It is for this reason that she has approached us for a loan amounting to ksh50000. This will allow her to expand her business by buying another motorbike and employing somebody to operate it.

She is grateful for this opportunity she is getting that will help her very much.

loans.use: to expand her business by buying another motorbike

loans.name: Kumba

texts.en: Kumba is 45 years old and lives in Montserrado County. This area is responsible for the highest production of fish on the Liberian market. She is married and has three children between the ages of 22 and 30. Two live on their own. For the past 8 years she has been selling ice in her community.  She started this business by helping her mother. She is requesting a loan to purchase more ice for her business. She hopes to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more ice for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy battery chargers

loans.name: Mwajeke

texts.en: Mwajeke is taking out another loan to expand his current business. He is a determined man who has the desire to move forward. He says that since he received the previous loan, his business has been growing little by little. This loan is for Ksh 50,000 and he will use it to buy more stock of flour, cooking fat,and instant goods for his general store.

loans.use: to buy more stock of flour, cooking fat,and instant goods for his general store.

loans.name: Giovanna

texts.es: La  Sra. Giovanna tiene 32 años, tiene  un hijito de la edad de 4 añitos, La  Sra. Giovanna se dedica a la venta de variedad de artículos de primera necesidad como abarrotes, dulces, refrescos y variedad de artículos en su tienda de barrio,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, La  Sra. Giovanna va a usar este préstamo para la compra variedad de abarrotes para surtir su negocio como arroz, fideo, harina y azúcar por mayor para surtir su tienda  y  de esta manera brindar variedad de productos a sus clientes,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando en su  negocio, La  Sra. Giovanna va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando productos y así mejorando sus ingresos, la Sra. Giovanna es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Giovanna is 32 years old. She has a little boy who is 4 years old. Giovanna sells a variety of staple items such as groceries, sweets, soft drinks, and a variety of other items in her neighborhood store. This is her first loan cycle with the institution. Giovanna is going to use this loan to buy a variety of groceries to stock her store such as rice, pasta, flour, and sugar at wholesale, and in this way provide a variety of products to her customers. Her reason for asking for this loan is to continue improving her business. Giovanna is going to use the money to continue buying products and in this way improve her earnings. Giovanna is a very hard-working person, and she feels happy and thankful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: to buy groceries

loans.name: Virgen De Los Remedios Group

texts.es:
Con la confianza de poder alcanzar sus ideales y que juntas podrían ayudarse, se formó un comité con 11  señoras humildes con el propósito de ayudarse las unas a las otras trabajando. 
Mirta es miembro de este grupo, ella se dedica a la costura y está muy contenta por estar dentro del grupo, ya que le ha sido de mucha ayudan ya que ha ido creciendo. Se define a su misma como una persona muy trabajadora y que desea salir adelante para ayudar a su familia.
Solicita de este crédito para poder comprar telas e hilos, ya que tiene muchos pedidos y quiere poder cumplir con sus clientes, ya que esa es su mayor publicidad.
texts.en:
With the confidence that they will achieve their ideals and be able to help one another, this committee of 11 humble women propose to work together.

Mirta is a member of this group. She engages in sewing and is very pleased to be part of this group since it has helped tremendously with her growth. Mirta defines herself as a hardworking person who wants to get ahead so that she can help her family. She is requesting a loan to buy fabrics and thread. Mirta already has many orders, so she wants to fulfill them for her customers. This will also provide her with much publicity.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and thread.

loans.name: Sarapio

texts.en: Sarapio is a 37-year-old man with six children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. In order to supplement his cocoa plantation, he decided to start a retail shop where he earns money to meet the daily expenses of his family. Like all good fathers, he wants to educate his children up to university and set up sustainable income-generating activities, such as housing, in order to secure their future. Price fluctuation poses a great challenge to his business growth. His goal is to trade wholesale. Sarapio intends to use this loan to buy general merchandise such as salt and soap to sell.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise such as salt and soap to sell.

loans.name: Fazil

texts.en:
Fazil is a 27-year-old master of home repair. He began this service five years ago. He is married and the father of one child.

He plans to start trading home repair materials. The lack of sufficient finances has not allowed him to start it yet. Even though he is new to this part of the business he believes that he can realize his plans.
 
He applied to VFAC for a loan in of 1500 AZN to start his own home repair business. This will allow him to provide a comfortable living condition for his family.

loans.use: To purchase necessary construction materials to start a home repair business.

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es: Sandra Patricia vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia, ella  se dedica a la compra y venta de productos por catálogo, como cremas, perfumes, cosméticos, entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, comercia desde su hogar y en forma ambulante se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren porque todo lo que venden es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además del servicio inigualable siempre a la orden de los clientes; Sandra es una mujer  activa, dedicada a su labor y muy luchadora todos los días se esfuerza por trata de cumplir sus sueños sabe que solo con constancia y amor al trabajo podrá alcanzar ese éxito, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda del producto y quiere recuperarse por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar cremas, perfumes, cosméticos etc. Sandra Patricia tiene buenas referencias de pago, es muy responsable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que le dará a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en: Sandra Patricia lives with her husband and her children in her own home. She works buying and selling products from a catalogue, such as creams, perfumes, and cosmetics, among others. She has been doing this for many years, and it has given her a lot of experience that has allowed her to earn a better income. She sells from her home, and as a street-vendor. She has gained many customers, who prefer her because everything she sells is top quality and at affordable prices. Her service is unequaled and always what the customer wants. Sandra is active, dedicated to her work, and tenacious. She works every day to achieve her dreams. She knows that she can only achieve success with perseverance and love of her work. In recent weeks, the demand for her products has increased and she wants to recover. This is why she is applying for a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy creams, perfumes, cosmetics, etc. Sandra Patricia has good payment references. She is very responsible and she is sure she will be able to pay off the loan. At the same time, she has faith that it will give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy creams, perfumes, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase mechanized farming equipment.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is a 31-year-old married man with four children living in Kasese, Uganda. For six years, he has been in the teaching profession, and with his meager salary he has been able to buy land.

The good father that he is, he wishes to educate his children to attain degrees as a minimum qualification, and also construct a permanent house for residence as they are currently in a mud wattle house. 

Joseph intends to use the loan to buy cement and bricks for construction of his family's house.

loans.use: to buy cement and bricks for construction of his family's house.

loans.name: Amelia

texts.en: Amelia is 54 years old and lives in Montserrado County, where there is the highest production of  fish on the Liberian market. She is married with two children, ages 14 and 30. Only one lives at home and is in school. For the past five years, she has been selling charcoal in her community. She started this business by selling charcoal for her mother and learned this trade from her. She is requesting a loan to purchase more charcoal for her business. She hopes to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more charcoal for her business.

loans.name: Baldomero

texts.es:
Baldomero de 55 años de edad, se ha ganado el cariño de todos sus vecinos por su amabilidad y buen sentido del humor. Ama su familia, la cual es el motor principal para luchar cada día y generar el sustento para sobrevivir. Aunque no contaba con recursos para iniciar su negocio, esto no fue impedimento para cumplir su sueño de convertirse en comerciante, con un pequeño capital que le prestó un amigo, este hombre inició con la venta de frutas y pescado en una mesa que ubicó a las afueras de su casa, con carteles para promocionar sus productos. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace un año.

Sus sueños no paran, por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de estanterías para ubicar sus productos y hacerlos más visibles y atractivos a sus clientes. Espera poder mejorar su condición económica y poder tener una vejez sin preocupaciones monetarias,  garantizarle a su familia un mejor futuro.
texts.en: Baldomero, 55, has won the hearts of all his neighbors because of his friendliness and his good sense of humor. He loves his family, which is his main motivation to fight everyday and generate the support to survive. Although he didn't have the resources to start his own business, this did not stop him from achieving his dream of becoming a businessman. With a little money lent to him by a friend, this man started selling fruit and fish at a table that he set up outside his house, with posters to promote his products. He has been doing this work for a year. His dreams don't stop, and this is why he is applying for a loan that he will use to buy shelves where he can put his products to make them more visible and more attractive to his customers. He hopes to improve his economic standing and not worry about money in his old age, guaranteeing his family a better future.

loans.use: to buy shelving.

loans.name: Marlene

texts.es: Marlene de 33 años de edad, es una mujer muy trabajadora quien vive con su esposo quien trabaja como agricultor y le ayuda con los gastos del hogar. Marlene desde hace tres años que se dedica a la venta de artículos por catálogo como: maquillaje, perfumes, cosméticos, productos para la limpieza y cacerolas para la cocina, y diferentes tipos de artículos para el hogar, ella es una persona muy confiable quien siempre entrega los pedidos a tiempo, es por esto que sus clientas son muy fieles a ella. Marlene solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el cual invertir en su negocio contando con la capacidad para realizar todos los pedidos que sus clientes le hacen, de esta manera Marlene también comprará más artículos que sin pedido previo ofrecerá a sus clientes con el deseo de aumentar sus ventas, lo que es de mucho beneficio para ella.
texts.en: Marlene, 33, is a very hard-working woman. She lives with her husband, who works as a farmer and helps her with household expenses. For three years, Marlene has sold products out of a catalogue, such as make-up, perfumes, cosmetics, cleaning products, kitchen pans, and different kinds of home products. She is a very trustworthy person who always delivers her orders on time. This is why her customers are very loyal to her. Marlene is applying for a loan from INTERGRAL, which she will invest in her business, having the ability to deliver all the orders that her customers give to her. This way, Marlene will also buy more products without orders, which she will offer to her customers with the goal of increasing her sales, which will benefit her greatly.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Henry

texts.en:
Henry is a 36-year-old married man with three children, two of whom attend school.

Henry has been a teacher for ten years at Ndongo SDA primary school, and was inspired by the fact that it is a permanent job, as his clients are primary pupils. 

He also does lumbering (wood cutting) for additional income. He wants money to buy land. However, delayed payment is his challenge. 

Henry is a hardworking man.

loans.use: to pay for land.

loans.name: Reena's Group

texts.en:
Reena is a mother of three children who lives in a remote part of Pakistan with her family. Her husband is a government employee. 

Reena is a very hardworking and independent woman. She always tries to fulfill all the needs of her children. With all of the household responsibilities, she is trying to help her husband to increase the family's net income as well. She is providing tailoring services in her community. 

Presently, Reena is interested in purchasing some tailoring materials like thread, needles, cloth, etc. to grow her business. To do that, she has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan, as a member of a seven-person lending group. 

With this profit, Reena is going to purchase new tailoring machines and would like to expand her business in the future. She is thankful to Kiva for this loan. 

Note: In the picture, Reena is holding a passbook in her hand, while one of the borrowers (Samina) is holding her baby.

loans.use: to purchase needles, thread, cloth, etc. for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy vegetables, cheese and meat to sell

loans.name: Maria Margarita

texts.es: María Margarita tiene 58 años de edad, soltera  y mamá de cinco hijos de 30, 32, 34, 36 y 38 años de edad, los cuales trabajan y son independientes. María es comerciante desde hace 27 años, se dedica a vender ropa nueva y zapatos al detalle de forma ambulante, aparte de eso recibe ayuda de sus hijos quienes envían remesas desde el extranjero. Inició su negocio con el objetivo de subsistir ya que es madre soltera y necesitaba sufragar los gastos de los estudios de sus hijos; actualmente cuenta con el completo apoyo de ellos y con el crédito obtenido pretende invertir en ropa y cosméticos para incrementar su inventario y por consiguiente sus ganancias. Una de sus metas es realizar remodelaciones en su casa. Maria Esta muy agradecidas con los inversionistas de kiva por el apoyo que ellos brindan a personas de bajos recuersos economicos.
texts.en:
María Margarita is 58 years old, single and the mother of 5 children ages 30, 32, 34, 36 and 38.  Her children work and are independent.  María has sold new clothes and shoes for 27 years.  She works as a traveling salesperson, and apart from this receives help from her children who send remittances from abroad.

She started her business with the goal to survive since she is a single mother  and needed to cover the expenses of her childrens' studies.  Currently she has the complete support of them and hopes to invest the loan requested in clothing and cosmetics to increase her inventory and through this her earnings. One of her goals is to remodel her home.  María is very grateful for the investors from Kiva for the support they offer to people with low incomes.

loans.use: to invest in work capital and supply her business by buying general merchandise like childrens' clothing and womens' blouses among other products

loans.name: Tarasisio

texts.en: Tarasisio is a hardworking man living in Kamwenge, Uganda. In order to meet the day-to-day needs of his family, he decided to set up a retail shop. He also sells rice and pork to earn extra income. Like most traders, he faces the challenge of inadequate capital to meet the high demand. His dreams are to educate his children up to university and own a wholesale shop. Tarasisio intends to use this loan to buy sugar, rice and maize flour to sell.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice and maize flour to sell.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Bonface

texts.en: Boniface is a member of Yehu Micro Finance. He is applying for a subsequent loan after repaying a previous loan. This loan is to help him expand his business by increasing the amount of land to farm and by improving the produce using fertilizers. He is grateful for the opportunity.

loans.use: to expand his business.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en: Julius is a 48-years-old married man with nine children and two orphans living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He grows cocoa which he directly sells to the factory and also has a retail shop to enable him in meeting the daily expenses. Customers not paying on time and inadequate capital pose a great challenge to his business growth while his dream is to own a wholesale shop. The purpose of the loan is to buy general merchandise such as salt and soap to sell.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise such as salt and soap to sell.

loans.name: Kasitoli

texts.en: Kasitoli is a 38-years-old married man with 3 children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He is a very hardworking man who is involved in agriculture, a retail shop business and he also earns a salary as a civil servant. He dreams of educating his children up to the university level and also expanding his business to new areas. Kasitoli intends to use the loan to buy food stuffs such as groundnuts and rice to sell.

loans.use: to buy food stuffs such as groundnuts and rice  to sell.

loans.name: Mirna Yaneth

texts.es: Mirna de 31 años de edad es una mujer trabajadora quien busca siempre el bienestar de su familia y hogar, ella vive junto a sus tres hijos menores de edad, por quien debe luchar día tras día debido a que no cuenta con ningún tipo de ayuda para sostenerlos. Mirna tiene un negocio en el que  comercializa leña, así mismo se dedica a la crianza de pollos de engorde y de carne de pollo la cual compra para luego vender, sus productos los ofrece en su casa de habitación y así mismo con el deseo de obtener mayores ganancias, los comercializa en el mercado municipal, donde tiene varias clientes. Mirna solicita un préstamo para poder comprar leña en mayores cantidades, mayor cantidad de carne de pollo y así mismo para comprar más pollos de engorde y su alimento, al aumentar sus productos Mirna podrá mejorar sus ventas lo cual es primordial para ella y sus hijos.
texts.en:
Mirna is a 31 year old working woman who is always looking after the wellbeing of her family and home. She lives with her three young children for whom she fights day after day since she has no type of help in order to care for them.

Mirna has a business selling firewood and also she works raising chickens to fatten and chicken meat which she buys to sell later. She offers her product from her home and likewise, hoping to obtain a better price, she sells them at the city markets where she has some customers.

Mirna is asking for a loan in order to buy firewood in larger quantities, a higher quantity of chicken meat and also more chickens to fatten and their feed. Upon increasing her products Mirna will improve her sales which is essential for her and her children.

loans.use: to buy firewood and chickens to sell.

loans.name: Calixtra De Jesus

texts.es: Calixtra de Jesús tiene 67 años de edad, casada y madre de nueve hijos de 41, 39, 37, 35, 33, 31, 29, 27 y 25 años de edad todos y cada uno de ellos independientes. Calixtra tiene una pulpería desde hace quince años, donde comercializa diferente tipo de productos de consumo, como granos básicos, gaseosas, golosinas entre otros, empezó el negocio por la necesidad de mejorar la condición de vida de su familia y poder apoyar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar, actualmente cuenta con el apoyo de las remesas que envían sus hijos y solicita el crédito con el objetivo de invertir en capital de trabajo para lograr surtir los productos de su negocio y darle una buena atención a su clientela, y en futuro poder realizar reformas en su casa. Calixtra agradece la ayuda que le brindan a los pequeños comerciantes de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua
texts.en: Calixtra de Jesus is 67 years old, married, and the mother of nine children, ages 41, 39, 37, 35, 33, 31, 29, 27, and 25, all of whom are independent.  Calixtra has operated a store for the last 15 years, where she sells different types of consumer goods, like basic grains, sodas, and candy.  She began the business out of the need to improve her family's quality of life and to support her husband with the household expenses.  Currently, she has the support of remittances that her children send her.  She is requesting this loan with the objective of investing the capital for work, in order to stock the products for her business and give good service to her clients.  In the future, she would like to be able make improvements to her home.  Calixtra appreciates the help that is provided for  small business owners of limited resources from poor countries like Nicaragua.

loans.use: to buy basic goods like rice, sugar, beans, oil, and bread, as well as frozen goods like chicken, sodas, and milk, amongst other products.

loans.name: Nazia's Group

texts.en:
Nazia, a member of a seven person lending group, has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan for her husband. Since 2010 her husband has been running a general store in Rawalpindi which is the only source of income for the family. They have two sons, both students.

With the loan, her husband will purchase a variety of goods for his store like sugar, milk packs, shampoos, a variety of oils, etc., to sell. Nazia is hopeful that this loan will help her to put aside some savings for her children's education. She feels good about taking out the loan from BRAC Pakistan and says many thanks to Kiva.

Note : In the photo, Nazia is holding a passbook in her hand.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of goods for a store like sugar, milk packs, shampoos,  etc., to sell.

loans.name: Norma Lizeth

texts.es: Norma Lizeth junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; ella se dedica a la venta de ropa, pantalones, camisas, vestidos, cosméticos, leña entre otros, tiene varios años con este negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en las ventas lo que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias; comercia desde su vivienda y de forma ambulante en las cercanías de la comunidad donde reside, es muy conocida y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad, los buenos precios y el excelente servicio; Norma es una mujer que se caracteriza por su amabilidad, honestidad y por ser muy dedicada a su labor, siempre esta luchando por las metas que desea alcanzar y sabe que con esfuerzo y amor a su trabajo podrá lograr el éxito que tanto desea, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión, pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor, cosméticos, leña. Norma Lizeth tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Norma Lizeth lives with her life companion and her children. She works selling clothing, pants, shirts, dresses, cosmetics, firewood and more. She has several years in the business and has had a lot of experience in sales which permits her to have higher earnings.

She sells from home and on foot in the surroundings of the community where she lives. She is very well known and has made many customers as they prefer her for the quality, the good prices and her excellent service.

Norma is a women who is known for her kindness, honesty and for being very dedicated to her work, always struggling for the goals she wants to achieve and she knows that through effort and love in her work she can achieve the success she so desires. 

In recent weeks the demand has increased and she wants to take advantage by making a new investment, but she does not have sufficient capital to respond and this is why she is asking for a loan through Integral to permit her to buy clothing at wholesale, cosmetics, and firewood. Norma Lizeth has a good payment record and moral character, and she says that she will pay back the loan and at the same time she hopes to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothing at wholesale, cosmetics, and firewood

loans.name: Angeline

texts.en: Angeline is 33 years old and lives in Montserrado County, which has the highest fish production on the Liberian market. Angeline is married with two children aged 10 and 17, who live at home and go to school. For three years now she has been selling sugar, garlic, flour etc. in her community. Angeline started this business with money given to her by her mother, and also learned this trade from her. Angeline is requesting a loan to purchase more sugar, garlic, flour etc. for her business. She hopes to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more sugar, garlic, flour etc. for her business.

loans.name: Alba Luz

texts.es: Alba Luz vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la compra y venta de frutas y verduras, fresas, plátanos, naranjas, tomates, cebollas, chiles entre otros tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el lugar donde comercia es muy concurrido de personas y ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere porque su producto es fresco, a buen precio, de calidad y  con un excelente servicio; Alba es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor con muchas ganas de salir adelante, siempre esta buscando alternativas que le permitan alcanzar el éxito, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar frutas y verduras por mayor. Alba Luz tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en: Alba Luz lives with her partner and her three children in her own house. She buys and sells fruits and vegetables: strawberries, bananas, oranges, tomatoes, onions, and chiles, among others. She has had the business for several years, and that has given her a lot of experience, which allows her to obtain the best earnings. The place where she sells is very busy with people and she already has a large clientele who prefer her because her product is fresh, of good quality, and sold at a good price with excellent service. Alba is an entrepreneurial woman, dedicated to her work, with a lot of desire to move ahead, always looking for alternatives that will allow her to achieve success. In recent weeks demand has increased, and she wants to take advantage of it to make a new investment, but she does not have sufficient capital. That is why she is asking Integral for a loan that will allow her to buy wholesale fruit and vegetables. Alba Luz has good payment references and she assures us she will be able to pay off the loan. At the same time she is confident that she will give her family a better life.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Maria Enma

texts.es: María de 31 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y una hija. Mariana trabaja en su propia sala de belleza en donde se dedica a realizar peinados, cortes de cabello, faciales, tintes, manicures, y otros servicios más, así mismo posee un cibercafé donde alquila computadoras para que las personas se conecten a internet y jóvenes realicen sus trabajos, en este negocio le brinda ayuda su hija, tanto la sala de belleza como el cibercafé  están ubicados en su casa de habitación lo que es muy positivo porque cuentan con ventajas como no tener que pagar locales. María solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda invertir en la compra de una computadora para mejorar el servicio del cibercafé y así mismo para invertir en la compra de productos de belleza como tintes, champú, cremas, acondicionadores y otros más con lo que mejorara el salón y así podrá atender más clientes.
texts.en:
María, 31 years old, lives with her husband and a daughter, Mariana. 

She works in her own beauty salon where she styles hair, cuts hair, does facials, dyes hair, does manicures, and other services. She also has a cybercafe where she rents computers so people can connect to the Internet and youngsters can do their homework. Her daughter helps her in the business. The beauty salon and the cybercafe are located in her home which is a plus because of advantages such as not having to pay rent. 

María is asking for a loan through Integral so she can invest in the purchase of a computer in order to improve the service of the cybercafe and at the same time invest in the purchase of beauty products such as hair dyes, shampoo, creams, conditioners and more so she can improve the beauty salon and thus be able to serve more clients.

loans.use: to buy products for her beauty salon

loans.name: Rafael Antonio

texts.es:
Rafael de 58 años de edad, originario de Granada, pero tiene 35 años de residir en Mangua, casado, padre de 6 hijos mayores de edad, todo son independiente, de oficio comerciante, se dedica al taller de vulcanización. Inicio su actividad hace 15 años, el cual decidió poner su propio negocio, debido a que no tenía trabajo y necesitaba un medio del cual subsistir  es por eso que hoy en día él se dedica a su negocio de taller de vulcanización ya que en donde tiene su taller es una zona muy transitada por sus clientes  y muy buena para el comercio, del que se siente muy satisfecho con las ganancias que le genera este negocio, este ha sido su primer negocio, cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos. 
Él está requiriendo el financiamiento para comprar llantas,rines, aceite para carro, neumáticos para carro, moto y bicicletas. Con el objetivo de hacer crecer su negocio, para obtener mejores ganancias, sus planes futuros es poder mejorar la infraestructura del local en donde tiene su negocio para darle una mejor presentación
texts.en:
Rafael, 58, is a native of Granada, but has lived in Managua for 35 years.  He is married, and is the father of six grown children who are all independent.  He is a merchant who has a tire repair shop.  He started this business 15 years ago.  He decided to start his own business because there was no work, and he needed to have way to earn a living.  This is why today he has his tire repair shop.  His shop is located in a very busy area where many of his customers pass through, and so it's a good place for business.  He feels very satisfied with the earnings that his business generates.  This has been his first business, and he has the support of his children.  

He is requesting a loan to buy rims, wheels, motor oil, and tires for cars, motorcycles and bicycles.  His goal is to make his business grow so that he can have better earnings.  For the future, his plan is to improve the infrastructure of his workshop to improve its appearance.

loans.use: to buy rims, wheels, motor oil, and tires for cars, motorcycles and bicycles

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en: Patrick is a thirty-six-year-old single man living in Kasese, Uganda. He is a social worker who works as a child development officer and has been in service for six years. He also trades in coffee and beans to earn extra income. Low salary and the high cost of goods pose a great challenge to his ambitions of becoming rich, while his dreams are to educate his children up to University, construct a permanent house for residence and venture into a goats business. Patrick intends to use the money to buy goats and construct a house.

loans.use: to construct a house and buy goats

loans.name: Babken

texts.en:
Babken is stilll engaged in bread production. His last 2 loans were from Kiva. Thanks to Kiva loans, Babken increased his business and his production now is going well. The whole family is engaged in Armenian traditional bread production. Babken delivers bread to their regional shops every morning and evening. 
For about a year, Babken has also been engaged in animal breeding. With the profit from their family production he bought some cows and sheep and takes care of them. He hopes to receive a good profit from his farming and he hopes to enlarge his new farming business in the future. 
Babken asks from Kiva a loan of 1.000.000 Armenian drams to buy cows and sheep for his new farming business.

loans.use: To buy cows and sheep for his new farming business

loans.name: Josaline

texts.en: Josaline is a forty-two-year-old married woman with eight children, living in Kasese, Uganda. She has had a business trading in cassava flour for four years and practices farming for additional income. At the start she would sell one sack of flour in two weeks but now sell two sacks per week. Her dreams are to educate her children up to University and diversify her business to trade in other food items, such as maize and groundnuts. Josaline intends to use the loan to buy cassava flour to sell.

loans.use: to buy cassava flour to sell.

loans.name: Mkambe

texts.en:
Mkambe, from Msambweni, Kenya, is 40 years old and married. She lives with her husband and three children. She owns a general kiosk where she buys goods in wholesale prices and resells them to her customers in retail. 
She has been doing this for the last 15 years, and she has been able to gain a wide range of customers.
She has applied for a loan amounting to KES 30000 so that she will be able to expand her business and restock her kiosk.
She is grateful for this chance and opportunity as she hopes it will boost her business.

loans.use: to expand her business and restock her kiosk

loans.name: Carlos Alfredo

texts.es: Carlos Alfredo vive junto a su vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hija en casa propia; él posee una discoteca móvil, anima diferentes eventos con su música variada, tiene varios años con el negocio y es muy conocido por las personas del lugar, tiene mucha clientela pues las personas lo prefieren porque es muy confiable, tiene excelentes precios y un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden de los clientes; Carlos  se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad y honestidad es muy humilde y siempre esta dedicado a su labor, le gusta luchar por lo que desea por eso se esfuerza dia a dia para ganarse un futuro mas prospero y así obtener el éxito que se merece, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y no quiere decepcionar a la clientela necesita comprar equipo pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito para la compra de un amplificador. Carlos Alfredo tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Carlos Alfredo lives with his life partner and daughter in their own house.  He has a mobile night club and hosts a variety of events with a variety of music.  He has several years of experience in the business and is very well known in the area.  He has a lot of customers.  People prefer him because he's trustworthy and has excellent prices and incomparable service; he's always ready to serve the customers.

Carlos is known for his great friendliness and honesty.  He's very modest and always dedicated to his work.  He likes to strive for what he wants, so he makes the effort every day to earn a more prosperous future for himself so he can get the success he deserves.

In the last few weeks demand increased and he doesn't want to disappoint his customers.  He needs to buy equipment but he doesn't have enough capital, so he's asking Integral for a loan to buy an amplifier.

Carlos Alfredo has a good payment record and is very responsible.  He's certain he'll be able to repay the debt and he also trusts that he'll bring financial security to his household.

loans.use: to buy an amplifier

loans.name: Dora Alicia

texts.es: Dora Alicia vive junto a su pequeña familia en casa propia; ella se dedica a la venta de antojitos típicos elabora pupusas, pasteles, yuca, empanadas, entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, comercia desde su residencia y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que se prepara es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además con el mejor servicio  y el mas rápido; Dora es una mujer activa entregada a su labor, lo que más desea en su vida es cumplir sus sueños, por eso trabaja con mucho esfuerzo sabe que así alcanzara el éxito; desde hace algún tiempo aumento la demanda y  no quiere decepcionar a sus clientes, es así como decidió aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital que le permita invertir en insumos, por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz, frijoles, quesillo, chicharrón, carne, verduras etc. Dora Alicia  tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, agrádese la colaboración y asegura que saldara la deuda y a la vez le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Dora Alicia lives with her small family in their own house. She works selling traditional snacks; she makes stuffed tortillas, cakes, cassava, and empanadas, among others. 

She has been in this business for many years, and it's been a very valuable experience that has allowed her to obtain better income. She sells from her house and has many customers, as people know that everything she makes is top quality and affordable, with the best and fastest service. 

Dora is an active woman who is committed to her work. What she desires most in her life is to fulfill her dreams; therefore, she puts a lot of effort into her work. She knows that in this way, she will achieve success. 

A while ago, her demand increased, and she doesn’t want to disappoint her customers. Due to this, she decided to increase production, but she lacks the capital that will allow her to invest in supplies. Therefore, she is requesting a loan from Integral that will allow her to purchase corn, beans, fresh cheese, pork cracklings, meat, vegetables, etc.

 Dora Alicia has good payment references and is very responsible. She is pleased for the contribution and assures that she will pay off the debt, and at the same time, give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase corn, beans, fresh cheese, pork cracklings, meat, and vegetables.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en: Josephine is 42 years old, single and lives at Gardnerville in Montserrado county, which is the commercial city of Liberia. She lives with her three children, who are aged between 12 to 16 years old, and are in school. Josephine stopped her education at 12th grade. For the past 4 years she has been running a table market where she sells pepper, Vita, salt, onions, palm oil, and more in the local market. Josephine started this business from her savings from the time she was selling boiled eggs. She likes the ways her customers buy from her and the profit she generates per day. She is requesting a loan to purchase more pepper, Vita, salt, onions, palm oil etc. for her business. In the near future she wants to build a shop.

loans.use: to purchase more pepper, Vita, salt, onions, palm oil etc. for her business

loans.name: Anthony

texts.en: Anthony is a 31-year-old married man with one child, living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He operates a retail shop and he began the business in order to meet the increasing needs of his family. He has been facing hardships of limited capital to buy all the products that his clients want. His goal is to trade in wholesale and venture into mechanized farming. Anthony intends to use the loan to buy sugar and washing detergents to sell.

loans.use: to buy sugar and washing detergents to sell

loans.name: Alex

texts.en: Alex used the previous loan to buy general merchandise to sell. He is a 29-year-old married man with three children, living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He owns a retail shop which he started a year ago with his personal savings. Alex faces the problems of price fluctuation, high fuel and transport costs and seasonal weather. His dream is educating his children and buying land to grow crops. Alex is requesting another loan to buy sugar, maize flour, soda and beer to sell.

loans.use: to buy sugar, maize flour, soda and beer to sell.

loans.name: Ana Oliva

texts.es:
Ana Oliva de 59 años de edad, tiene claro que para progresar, el trabajo no puede faltar. Después de separarse de su esposo le tocó asumir los gastos de su hogar, por lo cual decidió montar su propio negocio, lo que le permitió cuidar de sus dos hijos y generar ingresos para el sostenimiento de su hogar. 

Gracias a su cónyuge aprendió el oficio de panadería, aprendizaje que aprovechó salir adelante con su familia. Aunque no tiene un punto de venta directa ya que su negocio lo tiene en su casa, esta mujer después de elaborar sus productos se dirige al centro de la ciudad para comercializarlos en las tiendas y supermercados. De esta manera ha podido solventar sus gastos y ofrecerles a sus hijos educación.
Hoy se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos al por mayor para cumplir con los pedidos solicitados, reducir costos de producción y aumentar su rentabilidad.
texts.en:
Ana Olivia, 59, is certain that she must have work if she wants to make progress.  After separating from her husband she had to assume responsibility for the household expenses, so she decided to set up her own business.  This allowed her to take care of her children and generate income to support her household.

Thanks to her husband she learned the bakery trade, an apprenticeship that she makes the most of to get her family ahead.  She doesn't have a point of sales because she has her business in her house, but after making her products, this woman goes to the center of town to sell them in stores and supermarkets.  This way she has been able to cover her expenses and give her children an education.

She's requesting a loan today to buy ingredients wholesale to fill the orders requested, reduce her production costs, and increase her profitability.

loans.use: to buy bakery supplies wholesale

loans.name: Teco Porave Rekavo Group

texts.es:
El Comité Teco Porave Rekavo  actualmente está en el primer  ciclo, en total son 10 señoras las que integran el comité  cada una con ganas de trabajar en equipo. Se comprometieron  invertir su crédito en una actividad productiva y ayudarse las unas a las otras.
Amancia tiene una humilde despensa con todos los productos de primera necesidad que necesitan sus vecinos, con su pequeño negocio está saliendo adelante y ayuda a su familia.
Solicita de este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos para su despensa y así seguir abasteciendo a su vecindario.
texts.en:
The committee known as “Teco Porave Rekavo” is in its first loan cycle. A total of 10 women have joined this committee so that they could work as a team. They commit to investing their loans in productive business activities and helping one another.

Amancia manages a modest food pantry where she offers all types of basic necessities that her neighbors need. With this small business, she is able to get ahead and help her family. She is requesting a loan in order to invest in merchandise for her food pantry so that she can continue having stock to offer to her neighborhood.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her food pantry.

loans.name: Denis

texts.en: Denis used the previous loan to buy soda to sell. He is a 45-year-old married man with five children, who lives in Kamwenge, Uganda. He owns a retail shop where he has worked for 10 years. Denis started his business with capital worth 150,000 shillings and now it's worth 5 million shillings. His main challenges are fluctuating prices, inflation and customers who fail to pay bills on time. His dream is educating his children and expanding the business into new markets. Denis is requesting a loan to buy sugar, soda and mineral water to sell.

loans.use: to buy sugar, soda and mineral water to sell.

loans.name: James

texts.en: James is a 68-year-old, married man who has three children. He lives in Kamwenge, Uganda. He is a farmer, and with the profits from that activity he has been able to educate his children. Like all farmers, he has the challenges of unpredictable seasonal weather changes and price fluctuations. His plan is to venture into modern farming activities and to start a retail shop. James intends to use the loan to buy land for cultivation.

loans.use: to buy land for cultivation.

loans.name: Rosa Eveling

texts.es: Rosa Eveling, es una joven mujer de 34 años, casada y madre de un bebé de 2 años de edad, ella es dueña de una pulpería ubicada dentro de su vivienda en el casco urbano de su comunidad,  esta actividad la realiza desde hace doce años, comprando sus productos a diferentes distribuidores que ingresan a su comunidad, ella comenzó el negocio desde muy joven ya que proviene de una familia de escasos recursos, por lo cual se le dificultó continuar sus estudios y  se vio obligada a dedicarse al comercio. Su rutina diaria es levantarse a las 5:00 am, para abrir su pulpería desde hora muy temprana para aprovechar y vender ya que sus clientes tienen que levantarse y buscar el desayuno para mandar a sus hijos a clases hasta la 10:00 pm. Solicita el crédito con el objetivo de surtir el inventario de su pulpería, para volver más productivo su negocio. Su mayor sueño es terminar de construir su casa, y poder ampliar su negocio para asegurarle un buen futuro a su hija.
texts.en: Rosa Eveling is a 34-year-old young woman, married and the mother of a 2-year-old baby. She is the owner of a small grocery store located in her home in the urban center of her community. She has had this business for two years, buying her products from different distributors that come to her community. She started working when she was very young as she comes from a family with few resources, which made it difficult for her to continue her studies; she was forced to make a living from commerce. Her daily routine involves getting up at 5:00 am to open her small grocery store at a very early hour to benefit from and sell to her clients who have to get up and find breakfast to send their children to classes, and then working until 10:00 pm. She is asking for the loan with the objective of stocking up the grocery store's inventory so that her business will be more productive. Her greatest dream is to finish constructing her house, and to be able to expand her business to ensure a good future for her daughter.

loans.use: to invest in working capital and to invest in products of daily consumption like: basic grains, sugar, oil, candy and rice, among other products.

loans.name: Keny Edilia

texts.es: Keny de vive junto a su esposo quien trabaja mucho para poder dar lo mejor para su hogar y contar con todo lo necesario para vivir mejor. Keny se dedica a la venta de ropa femenina como: blusas, pantalones, camisetas, ropa interior y otros más. Ella es una persona que se esfuerza por vender más cada día ya que sabe la importancia que su aportación tiene para el bienestar de su casa y su familia. Keny comercializa la ropa de forma ambulante, contando con varios clientes fijos y así mismo la vende en su pupusería. Ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el cual pueda invertir en su negocio aumentando la cantidad de ropa así como también adquirir más variedad de colores, tallas, estilos y estampados, con lo que podrá abarcar mayor cantidad de gustos de las personas y de este modo aumentar sus ventas y ganancias.
texts.en: Keny lives with her husband, who works a great deal so that he can give his family the best and make sure they have everything they need to live better. Keny works selling women's clothing like blouses, pants, tee shirts, underwear and more. She is a person who works hard to sell more every day, because she knows the importance of her contribution to the well-being of her home and her family. Keny sells the clothing as a street vendor (she has several regular customers) as well as in her pupusa [grilled, stuffed corn tortillas] shop. She is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL so that she will be able to invest in her business, increasing the quantity of clothing and also acquiring a greater variety of colors, sizes, and designs. That way, she will be able to accommodate a greater range of personal tastes, thereby increasing her sales and earnings.

loans.use: to purchase clothing to sell.

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en:
Emmanuel is a 39-year-old, married man. He has four children and lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He is a medical personnel, working at a government health center. He has served in this capacity for five years. He also has his own clinic, which he started in order to provide services nearer to his community and earn extra income. High license fees and customers not paying on time pose a great challenge to his business. His dream is to own a hospital.

Emmanuel intends to use the loan to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy beer and soda to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies for her restaurant

loans.name: Eleno

texts.es:
El señor Eleno tiene 20 años, es soltero y vive con su madre en la ciudad de Carapeguá. Desde muy joven empezó a salir a vender las colchas que ellos mismos producen con su mamá, después de 5 años se independizó y empezó a trabajar por cuenta propia. Lleva  productos artesanales de la zona a venderlos por las ciudades de Fernando de la  Mora y Asunción,   transportándose en su motocicleta que gracias  a este trabajo logró comprarse y así mantener a su clientela.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de hamacas, frazadas y sábanas puesto que tiene muchos pedidos de estos productos.
texts.en:
Sr. Eleno is 20 years old, single, and lives with his mother in the city of Carapeguá. From a young age, Eleno has been selling quilts that his mother produces. After working for five years, he became independent and began working on his own. He takes local handmade products and brings them to the cities of Fernando de la Mora and Asunción to sell. Thanks to his work, he was able to buy a motorcycle that he uses for traveling so that he can maintain his clientele.

Eleno is requesting a loan to buy hammocks, blankets, and bed sheets since he has many orders for these products.

loans.use: to buy hammocks, blankets, and bed sheets.

loans.name: Oretha

texts.en: Oretha lives in Gardnersville in Montserrado County, which is a commercial city in Liberia. She is 37 years old and single with two children aged 18 and 21 years old. For the past seven years she has been selling pepper, rice, oil, coal, vita, salt and other goods in the local market. She started this business with her savings. She is now requesting a loan to purchase more pepper, rice, oil, coal, vita, salt etc. for her business. She plans to one day build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more pepper, rice, oil, coal, vita, salt etc. for her business.

loans.name: Los Perseverantes Vip Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Los Perseverantes VIP, lo integran 15 emprendedores, su principales rubros son la venta de ropa, cosméticos y alimentos. Todos viven en la comuna de Quilicura, cuidad de Santiago. 
Daniel Sotelo, quien aparece en la foto de pie el cuarto de izquierda a derecha; se dedica a la venta de comida rápida, sándwiches y almuerzos.  Nos cuenta que tiene un carro instalado en un sector empresarial ( Parque Industrial) por lo que sus clientes son todos los trabajadores que corresponden al conjunto de empresas de ese sector. 
Daniel trabaja de lunes a viernes, cuando amanece, ya esta en su lugar de trabajo preparando todo tipo de alimentos para su clientela. 
Todas los productos que necesita los compra en el mercado central La Vega, conocido por vender a precios muy convenientes.
Con el crédito compró una churrasquera, ( para preparar churrascos), con este artefacto prepara con rapidez las solicitudes de comida.
Su sueño es llegar a tener un restaurante, en lo personal dar un buen pasar económico a su familia.
Lo que más le motiva en seguir con su negocio es comprar su propia casa, ya que vive en la casa de sus suegros, con ellos, su esposa y dos hijos, ambos estudiando, con orgullo nos cuenta que el mayor de sus hijos es becado.
Daniel está muy agradecido por la ayuda que le ha brindado Fondo Esperanza, nos cuenta que le dieron la facilidad de crecer como microempresario, recibe apoyo y además ha aprendido importantes valores, madurando aun más como persona.
Quilicura es una comuna perteneciente a Santiago, capital de Chile, ubicada en el extremo noroeste de región metropolitana. El origen del nombre de la comuna viene del mapudungun (lengua mapuche): "kila", que significa “tres” y "kura" que significa “piedra”, por lo que se deduce que el nombre de Quilicura equivale a "tres piedras", como  el nombre que le dieron los primeros habitantes de este valle en referencia a los tres cerros que son perfectamente visibles y que delimitan la comuna.
texts.en:
This group is called “Los Perseverantes VIP” and is made up of 15 entrepreneurs who have businesses including clothing, cosmetics, and food sales.  They all live in the Quilicura community of Santiago.  Daniel Sotelo, who is shown standing and is the fourth from left to right in the photo sells fast food, sandwiches and lunches.  He says that he has a cart in the commercial sector (Industrial park) and all of his customers are those workers from these companies.

Daniel works from Monday through Friday.  He is already at his place of work when the sun comes up and is preparing all sorts of food for his customers.

He buys all of his supplies in the central market in La Vega, known for selling at very good prices.

He will use the money from this loan to buy a churrasquera (to make churrascos).  This will allow him to prepare orders quickly.

His dream is to have a restaurant and personally provide financially for his family.  What motivates him the most to keep this business is to buy a home of his own because they live at his in-laws’ house.  He is proud to say that his oldest son has a scholarship.

Daniel is very grateful to the assistance from Fondo Esperanza.  He tells us that they have made it easy for him to grow his small business and grow as a small businessman.  He receives support and has learned important values, and has matured as a person.

Quilicura is a community that is part of Santiago, the capital of Chile, located in the extreme northeast of the metropolitan region.  The origin of the name comes from Mapudungun (Mapuche language): “kila” means “three” and “kura” means “rock,” from where the name Quilicura is derived.  It means “three rocks,” a name given by the first inhabitants of this valley, referring to the three mountains that are perfectly visible and delineate the community.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Evelio De Jesus

texts.es: Evelio de 48 años de edad habita junto a su familia en casa propia, Él es un hombre que se caracteriza por ser un trabajador honesto, responsable y sincero dedicado a sus labores diarias y a darle un buen futuro a su familia. Evelio se dedica a la labor de ser agricultor posee un pequeño terreno donde cultiva los principales granos básicos como lo son maíz y frijol, y de sus cosechas vende cierta parte y la otra la utiliza para consumos propio. También en los tiempos donde no hay mucha cosecha realiza la labor de ser jornalero y de vez en cuanto albañil por eso los vecinos lo ven como día a día se espera para darle lo mejor a su familia y se rebusca porque a ellos no les falte nada. Evelio desea comprar insumos agrícolas para las próximas cosechas es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para la compra de semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas y espera contar con lo solicitado pues las cosechas se aproximan y el no posee lo suficiente para invertir en ellos. Esta seguro que podrá saldar la deuda antes de lo previsto y seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en:
Evelio is a farmer who has a small plot of land where he raises the basic grains such as rice and beans.  He sells part of his harvest and uses the rest for personal consumption.

Evelio is 48 years old and lives with his family in his own home.  He is known for being an honest, responsible, and sincere man dedicated to his daily labor and to providing a good future for his family.  He also works as a laborer and sometimes as a mason when it isn’t harvest season, so his neighbors see him every day.  He wants to provide the best for his family and be sure that they are not in need of anything.

Evelio wants to buy farming supplies for his next harvest, so he has requested a loan through INTEGRAL so he can buy seeds, compost, fertilizers, and pesticides.  He hopes to get this loan because the harvest season is nearing and he doesn’t have the capital he needs to buy the supplies.  He is certain that he will be able to get out of debt and continuing to provide his family with their daily bread.

loans.use: to buy farming supplie.

loans.name: Henry Antonio

texts.es: Henry de 24 años de edad vive junto a su familia, su esposa y sus hijos en casa propia, es un hombre trabajador, honesto que su mayor sueño e ilusión es brindarle y mejor futuro a sus hijos y estos el día de mañana vean el esfuerzo que su padre hace por ellos. Henry desde que se levanta realiza con entusiasmo las labores diarias, él se dedica a ser agricultor y cosecha los principales granos básicos como son maíz y frijol y también cereales como trigo, avena y arroz. Henry vende una parte pues es la única fuente de empleo que posee y la otra la deja para el consumo diario es así como él se gana la vida horadamente y busca siempre hacer el bien entre sus vecinos para no tener problemas con algún cliente. Desea invertir en insumos agrícolas pero no tiene el capital suficiente es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para la compra de semillas, abonos, fertilizantes y pesticidas espera en Dios que le seguirá dando la oportunidad de ser un padre ejemplar y un buen esposo.
texts.en:
Henry is 24 years old and lives with his family; his wife and children in a home of their own.  He is a hardworking, honest man and his greatest dream is to provide a better future for his children.  They see his efforts every day.  Henry enthusiastically works on his daily tasks.  He is a farmer and raises the basic grains such as corn, beans, and cereal grains such as wheat, oats, and rice.  Henry sells part of his harvest and this is his only source of income.  He uses the rest for personal consumption.  This is how he earns an honest living and he is always searching for ways to do good for his neighbors so that he will not have any problems with his customers.

Henry wants to invest in farming supplies but he doesn’t have the capital he needs, so he has requested a loan through INTEGRAL so he can buy seeds, compost, fertilizer and pesticides.  He hopes that God will continue giving him the opportunity to be an exemplary father and a good husband.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies

loans.name: Rosa Argentina

texts.es:
Rosa una humilde señora de 53 años de edad, originaria de Managua, casada, madre de 3 hijos entre las edades de 19,27 y 30 años respectivamente, de oficio comerciante, es dueña de una pulpería.  Inicio en el ámbito del comercio, hace 5 años con un capital de C$  2,000, dinero que tenía ahorrado, pudo comprar  todos los productos necesarios para agregar al inventario de su pulpería y poder salir adelante con su negocio que le genera ganancias a diarias, cuenta con clientes fijos, ya que con las ganancias que le genere su negocio desea convertir su pulpería en una miscelánea  para satisfacer las necesidades de su clientela, sus expectativas es ampliar el negocio. 
Ella está requiriendo el financiamiento para comprar  cuadernos, lapiceros, borrador, mochilas, reglas y uniformes escolares, ya que se acerca la temporada escolar en donde las ventas son muy buenas, con el objetivo de incrementar sus ventas para obtener mejores ganancias, sus planes futuros es hacer crecer para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio, una de sus metas próximas es establecer otro negocio como es la venta de comida.
texts.en:
Rosa is an unassuming woman of 53. She is from Managua, and is a married mother of three sons aged 19, 27 and 30 respectively. A shop-keeper by trade, she is the owner of a local grocery store. Beginning in the field of trade 5 years ago with a capital of C$ 2,000, money which she had saved, she could buy all the products necessary to make up the inventory of her store and to do well with her business. This generates daily earnings, she has regular customers, so with the profits her business generates she wants to convert her grocery store into a convenience store, to satisfy the needs of her customers. She expects to expand the business. 

She needs the funding to buy notebooks, pencil cases, erasers, backpacks, rulers and school uniforms, as the time of the school year is approaching when sales are very high, with the objective of increasing her sales to make higher profits. Her future plans are to expand and keep investing in her business. One of her next goals is to establish another business, such as selling food.

loans.use: to buy notebooks, pencil cases, erasers, backpacks, and school uniforms

loans.name: Angela Del Carmen

texts.es: Ángela de 32 años de edad, vive junto a su hija menor y junto a su esposo. Ángela  posee una tienda en la cual vende productos de primera necesidad para el hogar y para las personas tales como: jabón, champu, pan, leche, golosinas, y otros productos más los cuales son básicos en este tipo de negocios. Ella cuenta con muy buenas referencias por parte de sus vecinos y amigos, ya que tanto Ángela como su esposo son dos personas muy trabajadoras, las cuales se dedican por completo al bienestar de su hogar. Ángela solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL a través del cual pueda surtir su negocio con todo lo necesario para aumentar su inventario y de esta manera ofrecer más productos a sus clientes y así mejorar sus ganancias y poder salir adelante junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Ángela is 32 years old. She lives with her husband and her daughter. 

Ángela has a store where she sells everyday household staples like soap, shampoo, bread, milk, snacks, and other products typically sold in this type of store. She has very good references, including her neighbors and friends, because both Ángela and her husband are very hardworking people who are completely dedicated to the well-being of their family. 

Ángela is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL with which she will be able to stock her store with what she needs to increase her inventory so she can offer more products to her customers. This will improve her earnings, enabling Ángela and her family to get ahead.

loans.use: to invest in her store by buying staple products.

loans.name: Mayis

texts.en:
Mayis has 18 years of experience as a barber. Today he faces temporary difficulties such as a shortage of equipment and an incomplete work place. The construction of his own workshop is not finished and he currently works at his friend's shop. Mayis is a father of two teenage sons. One of them is working as a waiter and helps support the family needs.
The reason he has applied for this loan is that he wants to start a trading business with his wife. They will buy women's clothing, perfumes, cosmetics and other small things to re-sell.

loans.use: to buy women's clothing, perfume and cosmetics etc. to re-sell.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is 32 years old and lives in the town of Namutumba in the Iganga region of Uganda. He is married and has four children, with three of them currently in school. For the past five years, Stephen has been working hard to manage his retail store which sells salt, sugar and other items.

To help expand his business, Stephen has requested a loan of 3,000,000 Ugandan shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to expand the business with new and different items for the store and will help Stephen to generate greater profits and meet customers' needs. Stephen hopes that he will be able to build a home for himself in the future.

Stephen is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP). The program primarily serves micro entrepreneurs like Stephen who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to expand the business with new and different items for the store

loans.name: Deo

texts.en:
Deo is a 42-year-old married man with five children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. 

After realizing that farming alone could not facilitate him in meeting the day-to-day needs of his family, Deo decided to venture into a motorcycle transport business. High fuel prices limit his profits, while his dreams are to educate his children up to the university and to buy at least five motorcycles.

Deo intends to use the loan to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
Regina is 32 years old and lives in the town of Busia in the Iganga region of Uganda. She is married and has 6 children, 5 of them are currently in school. For the past 4 years, Regina has been working hard to manage her clothes store, which sells men's outfits.

To help expand her business, Regina has requested a loan of 2,500,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to start trading in women’s clothing, and will help Regina to generate greater profits and educate her children. Regina hopes that in the future she will be able to improve on her standard of living.

Regina is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP). The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Regina who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to buy stock of women's clothing to expand her options.

loans.name: Nidzinza

texts.en:
Nidzinza is from Msambweni, a coastal town in Kenya. She is 30 years old and married with two children. They are both still in school. She is a very hardworking person who has always worked to reach her goals and objectives. She owns a cereals stall near her home. Her stall is well stocked with common cereals including peas, maize and beans, used by common people in the area.
She has been able to build up a wide range of customers and that is why she is applying for a loan of KSH.50000, to expand her business and buy sacks of maize, beans, peas, millet, some vegetables, bunches of bananas, and bags of coconuts to fully satisfy her customers.
She is grateful for this opportunity that will help her very much.

loans.use: to expand her business and buy sacks of maize, beans, peas, and millet.

loans.name: Mario David

texts.es: Mario de 50 años de edad habita junto a su familia, es un hombre muy trabajador que siempre se ha caracterizado por tener y brindarle los mejores beneficios a su familia, muy emprendedor y visionario capaz de realizar cualquier trabajo que le genere un beneficio propio. Mario es agricultor de profesión siempre en cosechas comercializa los principales granos básicos como maíz y frijol y también en los tiempo donde no hay cosecha de dedica hacer jornalero. Su mayor sueño e ilusión es mejorar su vivienda pues no la tiene en las mejores condiciones y en los tiempo de invierno mucho le da problema es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo comprar insumos agrícolas como semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Él quiere trabajar mucho más de lo que ha trabajado para incrementar sus ingresos y así mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en: Mario is 50 years old and lives with his family.  He is a hardworking man who has always been known for having and providing the best for his family.  He’s very entrepreneurial and visionary and is able to do whatever work that will benefit him.  Mario is a farmer who raises the basic grains such as corn and beans and also works as a laborer when there are no harvests.  His greatest dream is to make improvements to his home because it is not in good shape and the wintertime causes problems.  He has approached INTEGRAL for a loan so he can buy farming supplies such as seeds, compost, fertilizers, pesticides, and other things.  He wants to work much more than he has in order to increase his income and be able to make improvements to his home.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: David Jonatan

texts.es: David de 34 años de edad habita junto a su familia, es un hombre que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser trabajador, honesto, humilde y muy responsable con sus obligaciones de esposo y padre de familia. Su mayor inspiración son sus hijos quienes lo motivan a dar lo mejor de sí y cada mañana se levanta con nuevas ilusiones de trabajo todo porque a ellos no les falte nada y el día de mañana se lo agradezcan. David es agricultor cultiva y comercializa granos básicos como maíz, frijol y maicillo siempre lo ha hecho y es así como se gana la vida horadamente, él desea comprar insumos agrícolas para  las próximas cosechas que se aproximan es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y comprar semillas, abonos, fertilizantes y pesticidas así el podrá seguir llevando el sustento diario a su hogar y podrá realizar su sueño que es brindarle un mejor futuro a sus hijos.
texts.en:
David is 34 years old and lives with his family.  He has always been known for being hardworking, honest, humble, and very responsible with his obligations as a husband and father.  His children are his greatest aspiration and they motivate him to give his all and every morning he gets up with new hopes for working, all so that his children are not in need of anything; they appreciate that.

David is a farmer and he raises basic grains such as corn, beans, and sorghum.  He has always done this and this is how he earns an honest living.  He wants to buy farming supplies for the next harvest, which is approaching, so he has requested a loan through INTEGRAL, so he can buy seeds, compost, fertilizer, and pesticides to continue sustaining his household and realize his dream of providing a better future for his children.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Yolanda Elizabeth

texts.es: Yolando posee una sala de belleza, en la cual realiza cortes de cabello, tintes, pedicure, manicure, faciales y todo lo relacionado con el cuidado de la imagen. Ella vive junto a su esposo y junto a dos hijos. Yolanda posee su negocio en su casa de habitación con el enorme deseo de mejorar la estabilidad económica de su casa, ella es una persona muy trabajadora la cual también comercializa perfumes, tratamiento para el cuidado del cabello, peines, cremas para el cuerpo, champo y otros productos más para obtener más ganancias,  ella cuenta con varios clientes  quienes se sienten a gusto con el trabajo hecho por Yolanda  y por sus precios tan accesibles. Ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL con el fin de poder comprar mayor cantidad de productos  de mejor calidad y de esta forma mejorar la estabilidad de su negocio.
texts.en:
Yolanda has a beauty salon where she does haircuts, hair color, pedicures, manicures, facials, and everything related to caring for one's appearance. She lives with her husband and two children. 

Yolanda runs her business in her home, and she has a strong desire to improve the economic stability of her household. She is a very hardworking person; she also sells perfumes, hair treatments, combs, body creams, shampoo, and other products to increase her earnings. She has many customers who are pleased with her work and her very affordable prices. 

Yolanda is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL with the goal of being able to buy a greater quantity of high-quality products, thereby improving the stability of her business.

loans.use: to buy hairstyling and skincare products for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy land to begin farming to supplement his teaching income.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en: Robert is a 33-year-old married man with two children living in Masindi, Uganda. He practices farming and also runs a bar that he has had for five years. He faces a challenge of price fluctuations and inadequate capital for the business. His dreams are to educate his children to attain degrees as a minimum qualification, build a house and expand his farming activities. Robert intends to use the loan to pay workers who are helping him to harvest his maize crop.

loans.use: to pay workers who are helping him to harvest his maize crop.

loans.name: Nadupoi

texts.en:
Nadupoi has paid off her loan successfully and is now applying for her fifth loan of KES. 80,000, which she will use to purchase animals to fatten and resell at a profit.  

Nadupoi is a hardworking lady. She plans to pay her children’s school fees with the increased profits.

She hopes to grow her business into a large-scale venture, as well as improve the family's living standards.

loans.use: to purchase animals to fatten and resell at a profit.

loans.name: Yaninna Alicia

texts.es: La Sra.  Yaninna tiene 22 años, ella se dedica a la venta material de ferretería como grifos para instalaciones de agua, tiene su puesto de venta que se encuentra en la zona de Miraflores,   este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra.  Yaninna va a usar este préstamo para la compra material de ferretería por mayor  para surtir su negocio y  de esta manera brindar variedad de productos  a sus clientes,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando en su  negocio, la Sra.  Yaninna va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando productos y así ir mejorando sus ingresos, su deseo para su negocio es tener una ferretería muy surtida. La Sra.  Yaninna es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada a ella ya sus compañeras del grupo ya que en muchos casos son personas que sacan adelante solas a sus familias.
texts.en:
Yaninna is 22 years old and sells hardware items, such as faucets for water systems. Her sales post is located in the Miraflores zone. This will be her 1st loan through our institution. 

Yaninna will use her loan to purchase hardware merchandise at wholesale to stock her business and, in this way, to offer a variety of products to her customers. Her purpose in soliciting the loan is to continue improving her business. Yaninna will use the resulting benefits to continue buying products and thus, continue improving her income. Her goal for her business is to have a well-provisioned hardware store. 

Yaninna is a very hard-working person and she is happy for the opportunity this offers her and her companions in the group, since in many cases, they are people who are advancing their families.

loans.use: buy merchandise for her hardware store.

loans.name: Jacinta

texts.en:
Jacinta is 29 years old, and a mother of one child.  She has a clothes selling business in the town of Tala. She sells blouses, skirts, shirts, trousers as well as clothes and shoes for children. She has operated the business for the past one year and it has been profitable.

This is her first loan; she plans to buy more stock of blouses, suits and trousers to sell in her shop. This will enable her to have enough stock and thereby meet the demands of her clients and make more profits with which she plans to pay school fees for her child and also open another boutique business.

She hopes to grow her business by opening another boutique, earn a larger income and be able to provide for the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock of clothes to sell.

loans.name: Lukiya

texts.en:
Lukiya is 36 years old and lives in the town of Bugiri in the Iganga region of Uganda. She is married and has 2 children who are currently in school. For the past 4 years, Lukiya has been working hard to manage her stationary shop.

To help expand her business, Lukiya has requested a loan of 2500000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more stationary for the shop, and will help Lukiya generate greater profits. Lukiya hopes that in the future she will be able to get more profits from the business.
