Desea contar en esta ocasión con 3,000 nuevos soles para la compra de una mototaxi y ponerlo en alquiler para generar más ingresos y lograr a largo plazo adquirir un automóvil.
texts.en:
Máximo is 23, and though he is not yet married, he hopes one day to meet his ideal mate and have a thriving family. He owns a house made of wood. He is enthusiastic about his profession, driving a rented station wagon in which he offers service to various rural areas around his neighborhood. In the two years he has been working at this job, he has gained a lot of experience. During the rainy season, however, he can't reach these areas because the roads are not paved. 

He acknowledges that being young and independent means taking advantage of your ability to work; therefore, he wishes to buy a smaller vehicle for hire. He aspires to own a car to transport passengers, a dream he is working toward that will provide stable income. He is applying for a loan of 3,000 nuevos soles to buy a taxi for hire that will generate more income. In the long term, he wants to buy an automobile.

loans.use: to buy a taxi.

loans.name: Adriana

texts.es:
La Sra. Adriana tiene 51 años y está casado con el sr. Juan de 52 años. Tienen 3 hijos, dos de ellos ya trabajan y son independientes.
El Sr. Juan trabaja desde hace 20 años en una Empresa Constructora, la Sra. Adriana se dedica a la venta ambulante de prendas de vestir y calzados para damas, caballeros y niños desde el año 2009  por lo que cuenta con una clientela formada.
Ella solicita el crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de jeans, prendas de vestir para damas y caballeros y Uniformes para escuelas y colegios, ya que se acercan de nuevo los tiempos de clases y quiere seguir con sus buenas ventas.
texts.en:
Sra. Adriana is 51 years old and married to Sr. Juan, age 52.  They have three children, two of whom are already working and independent.


Sr. Juan (Adriana’s husband) has been with a construction company for 20 years.  Sra. Adriana has been working as a street vendor, selling clothes and shoes for women, men, and children since 2009.  She has an established clientele.

Adriana is requesting a loan so that she can invest in the purchase of jeans, clothes for men and women, and uniforms for elementary and high school students.  Since a new school year is approaching, she wants to continue making good sales.

loans.use: to buy jeans, school uniforms, and articles of clothing for women and men.

loans.name: Soutoura Group

texts.fr:
Soutoura est un groupe de l’association Minataton de Keleya. Il regroupe  5 femmes qui se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté et de voisinage. Elles ont une moyenne d’âge de 38 ans. Mariées avec cinq enfants en moyenne, elles mènent différentes activités  telles l’achat vente de condiments et de riz à l’image de Moh qui est la deuxième personne debout de la droite vers la gauche de la photo. Elles vivent dans des grandes familles traditionnelles à Keleya dans la préfecture de Bougouni (Région de Sikasso, République du Mali).  Elles sont dans le petit commerce depuis plusieurs années et sont très sollicitées dans leurs activités. 
Dans le souci de satisfaire le besoin croissant de leur clientèle, les membres du groupe ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso. Elles sont à leur huitième prêt solidaire. 
Moh, qui est la présidente du groupe et très connue à Keleya et excelle dans la vente de riz. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, quelques sacs de riz de production locale.  Elle s’approvisionne dans les villages environnants et sur place auprès des grossistes  et vend ses produits à Keleya, en détail, au comptant et à crédit, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes.   
Elle espère sur un bénéfice mensuel de 30.000FCFA somme qui lui  permettra de rembourser le prêt et de réinvestir dans son activité.
texts.en:
Soutoura is a group belonging to the Minataton de Keleya association. It comprises five women who know each other through family and neighbourhood connections. They are on average 38 years old. Married with five children on average, they run various businesses such as the buying and selling of condiments and rice, which is the activity run by Moh, the second person standing from the right in the photo. They live in large traditional households in Keleya in the Bougouni prefecture (Sikasso region, Republic of Mali). They have run their small businesses for many years and are highly sought-after for their services.
With the hope of satisfying the increasing demands of their clientele, the group members decided to join Soro Yiriwaso's loan program. They are on their eighth solidarity (group) loan.
Moh, who is the group's president, is very well-known in Keleya and excels in selling rice. She intends to use her loan to buy several bags of locally produced rice. She gets her supplies in the neighbouring towns and in her area from wholesalers and sells her products in Keleya at retail, in cash and on credit, to a clientele composed of men and women.
She hopes to earn a monthly profit of 30,000 FCFA, which will allow her to repay her loan and reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To buy rice.

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en:
Parveen is a 32-year-old married woman. She is a vigorous lady and, for the past three years, has been running a clothing business. Parveen buys clothes of different fabrics in various colors and designs from the market at wholesale rates and then sells them to the people of her community. She has a varied customer base and is able to earn enough through her business. 

Parveen is requesting a 30,000 PKR loan from the Kashf Foundation to buy a wide variety of clothing in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her inventory. Parveen expects a boost in her earnings with her loan and she plans to spend the part of her profits for the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothing in different colors and designs to attract more customers

loans.name: Lubna

texts.en:
Ms. Lubna is 35 years old and an unmarried woman who has been doing a business of milk sales for many years to contribute to the family income. She has two cows in milk and counts a good client list. She sells milk to many of her neighbors, along with butter that she makes from the milk. Her business is good enough to allow her to lead a decent life. 

Lubna has two siblings and is very motivated to provide them a beautiful life with good education, food and clothing.  She has improved her business to meet the day-to-day expenses of life. 

It’s her fourth year with Kashf Foundation; she is happily running her business through the support from Kashf. Now she has requested a loan of Rs 30,000 to purchase one more cow. She hopes to increase her production capacity which ultimately helps in generating more cash.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow

loans.name: Amal

texts.en: The quality of Amal’s services has improved now that she is enhancing every step in the process of making a cloth item. Amal has applied for another loan to buy more fabric and better quality of thread.

loans.use: to buy more fabric and better quality thread

loans.name: Caciano

texts.es:
Casiano de 35 años tiene el orgullo de compartir una vida conyugal con Elvira de 29 años y junto a ellos a sus 3 retoños Yesenia , angelo y Liz.
Posee una vivienda construida  base de madera adquirida con muchos años de trabajo.
Anteriormente dedicado a actividades agropecuarias optó pensando en el futuro de su familia por incursionar en diversas labores en la ciudad de su localidad logrando desde hace 5 años en adquirir una mototaxi con el cual logro sustentar su hogar de a pocos.
Le agrada su trabajo puesto que al poseer un horario libre le permite estar con su familia en horas del almuerzo así como transportar a sus hijos al colegio.
Al iniciarse la temporada de lluvias en su localidad debe realizar un mantenimiento general a su vehiculo así como adquirir llantas especiales para el lodo con el cual espera transportar mas pasajeros en diversas condiciones climáticas generando ingresos firmes.
Sus planes para el futuro apuntan a la compra de una mototaxi tipo carguero el cual espera modificarlo y acoplarlo para transporte de pasajeros inter anexos en su localidad  esperando de esta manera generar mas ingresos e innovando una nueva manera de transporte en su localidad. En esta ocasión desea contar con un préstamo de 2,500 nuevos soles y realizar el mantenimiento general de su vehiculo mototaxi así como de llantas nuevas para la temporada de lluvias, el resto lo planea invertir en la educación de sus hijos a propósito del inicio de la época escolar.
texts.en:
Casiano, 35, is proud to share a life with Elvira, 29, and their 3 children; Yesenia, Angelo and Liz. He owns a house made of wood purchased with many years of work. 

Previously working in farming, he chose, thinking about the future of his family, to enter in a different job in the city. He managed to purchase a mototaxi 5 years ago, with which he managed gradually to support his home. He likes his job since he has an open schedule which allows him to be with his family during lunch time as well as take his children to school. At the beginning of raining season in his area he must make general maintenance to his vehicle as well as buy special rims for the mud with which he hopes to transport more passengers in various climatic conditions, generating a fixed income.

His plans for the future is to purchase a mototaxi, a freight-carrying type, which he hopes to modify and to have a hitch to transport passengers in his area hoping to generate more income and innovating a new way of transport in his area. 

At this time, he is requesting a loan of 2.500Peruvian Soles to make general maintenance on his mototaxi as well as buy new rims for the raining season. With the remainder he plans to invest in the education of his children with regard to the beginning of the school year.

loans.use: to do mechanical maintenance on his vehicle.

loans.name: Mujer Emprendedora Group

texts.es:
El comité Mujer Emprendedora, pasan al 5to. ciclo del programa ellas son de la ciudad de Lambaré, y se fijaron como meta el ayudarse las unas a las otras y por medio de ese trabajo salir adelante.
Marina, una de las miembros, se dedica a la venta de prendas usadas de todo tipo, y cuenta que su negocio está muy bien, ya que últimamente las prendas usadas se venden mucho. Su idea es poder seguir trabajando y el día de mañana poder tener un mayor negocio.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas de segunda mano y así tener un mayor stock y variedad que poder ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The Mujer Emprendedora communal bank is in its fifth loan cycle in the program.  They're from the city of Lambaré and they set the goal of helping each other so they can get ahead.

Marina, one of the members, makes a living selling all types of used clothing.  She says her business is doing well because used clothing is selling well lately.  Her idea is to be able to continue working so she can have a better business in the future.

She's requesting this loan to be able to invest in buying second-hand clothing to have a better supply and variety to be able to sell to her customers.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothing

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.es:
Evelyn, de 23 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa además de ser amable y solidaria. Está separada del padre de su hija.  Vive en compañía de su hija, sus padres y su hermano,  habitando en la casa de sus padres.
La actividad que realiza Evelyn es la venta de ropa intima para damas, caballeros y niños de toda variedad, mercadería que lo obtiene de la confecciones que su madre hace, y ella quien motivo a Evelyn a iniciar en la venta. Tiene más de de 1 año ejerciendo el comercio, ofreciendo a familiares, amistades y amigas, de manera personal y entregando los pedido a domicilio.
Considera rentable su negocio por las buenas ganancias que le deja, además que le deja tiempo para dedicarlo a su hija, y le genera  un ingreso económico para apoyar a sus padres  en los gastos familiares. Le gusta lo que hace ya que se ha convertido en una mujer muy productiva y por ello está muy entusiasmada y espera poder crecer en su negocio y formar un taller de confecciones y ventas en sociedad con su madre.
Este es el préstamo 04 con la institución MFP, y espera su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles, lo invertirá  en su totalidad en la compra de ropa intima para damas, caballeros y niños.
texts.en:
At 23 years old, Evelyn is a hard-working and persevering woman, as well as being friendly and caring. She is separated from her daughter's father.  Evelyn lives in her parents' house with her daughter, her parents, and her brother.

Evelyn sells intimate apparel of all kinds for women, men and children. Her mother makes the apparel that Evelyn sells, and she is also the one who motivated Evelyn to start the business. Evelyn has been selling intimate apparel for more than a year, personally offering it to relatives, acquaintances, and friends and then delivering the orders to their homes.

She considers her business profitable because of the good profits she has made. The business also leaves her time to dedicate to her daughter and generates income to help her parents with the family's expenses. Evelyn likes what she does.  She has become a very productive woman and is very enthusiastic about this. She hopes to be able to expand her business and open a shop making a selling clothing together with her mother.

This is her fourth loan with MFP and she hopes for your collaboration so that she can achieve her plans. She will use the entire requested amount of 1000 Nuevos Soles to buy intimate apparel for women, men and children.

loans.use: to buy intimate apparel for women, men, and children.

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
Norma, de 38 años, es una mujer amable y muy buena, esta separada del que fue su conviviente por muchos años y con quien tuvo dos hijos de 18 Gleysi y Cristina de 03 años, ella como una madre coraje trabaja a diario para poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijas con quienes vive en su casa propia. El trabajo de Norma consiste e la venta de comida, tiene un restaurante muy concurrido en su casa en donde trabaja en esta actividad desde hace 13 años. Tiene la ayuda de dos personas a quienes contrata debido a que la demanda por sus platos de comida aumenta cada día más y no se abastece ella sola para la atención al público, gracias a la ayuda de estas dos personas puede estar mas tranquila ya que respaldan su trabajo.
Está muy contenta con su negocio, pues le permite dar trabajo a personas que desean generar ingresos para su familia, además que le permite estar a lado de sus hijas quienes están en edad de necesitar mucho los sabios consejos de los padres y que les hagan ver el camino a ser personas de bien. Tiene muchos clientes, esto le permite mejorar sus ingresos cada día, espera poder mejorar la infraestructura de su local, además de poder hacer crecer su negocio y vender mayor variedad de platos de comida a sus clientes. Este será el sexto préstamo con MFP, esta muy contenta por que le brindaran un respaldo financiero y así podrá aumentar su capital de trabajo, sabe que tendrá que ser muy responsable y sobre todo muy puntual, esta contenta de pertenecer su banco comunal ya que ve que son muy solidarios. Con el monto solicitado 1500 nuevos soles, comprará ingredientes e insumos tales como arroz, menestras, huevos, pollo, entre otros. Además cambiara algunos utensilios con los que realiza su trabajo.
texts.en:
Norma, 38, is a friendly and very good woman. She is separated from her live-in partner of many years, with whom she had two children: Gleysi, age 18, and Cristina, age 3. As a courageous mother, she works daily to be able to offer her daughters, whom she lives with in her own house, a better quality of life.

Norma works selling food. She has a very busy restaurant in her house where she has worked for 13 years. She has the help of two people who she employs due to the fact that demand for her dishes rises more each day and she cannot supply the necessary customer service. Thanks to the help of these two people, she can be more calm since they support her workplace.

She is very happy with her business because it allows her to provide work to people who wish to generate an income for their families. It also allows her to be at her daughters' sides, who are at an age where they need the wise advice of their parents as well as their help to see the path toward being good people.

She has many customers, which allows her to improve her income every day. She hopes to be able to improve the infrastructure of her business premises, as well as being able to grow her business and sell a greater variety of dishes to her clients.

This will be her sixth loan with MFP. She is very happy because they offer her financial support and that allows her to raise her working capital. She knows she will have to be very responsible and above all, very punctual. She is happy to belong to her community bank since she sees that they are very unified. With the amount requested of 1500 nuevos soles, she will buy ingredients and supplies such as rice, beans, eggs, chicken, and more. She will also change out some of the old utensils she uses for her work.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and supplies such as rice, soups, beans, eggs, chicken, and more. She will also change out some of the old utensils she uses for her work.

loans.name: Saliz

texts.es:
Saliz, de 71 años, es un hombre bueno, amable y trabajador, a pesar de tener una edad muy avanzada no duda en poder generar sus propios ingresos y no depender de nadie para poder seguir viviendo, es viudo y vive solo en una casa alquilada, tiene dos hijos que son mayores,  trabaja mucho ya que desea juntar algún dinero para poder tener una vejez tranquila. Saliz, todos los días sale al mercado que está mas cerca de su casa, es ahí en donde tiene un pequeño puesto de golosinas, además vende carbón y bebidas, es muy activo ya que siempre está en constante movimiento intentando concretar algún negocio con los clientes. Lleva realizando su trabajo por más de 02 años y durante éste tiempo aprendió que tiene que tratar bien a los clientes para que puedan volver siempre, trabaja solo ya que así gana más.
Le está yendo muy bien en su negocio, tiene muy buenas ventas y esto le permite tener mejores ingresos, le gustaría aumentar sus productos y ofrecer mayor variedad de cosas y bebidas a sus clientes, es por eso que aun tiene en mente aumentar su negocio y hacerlo crecer, recuerda que antes de empezar con su negocio dependía mucho de lo que sus hijos le daban, pero como siempre fue un hombre fuerte y emprendedor, decidió generar su propios ingresos para no tener que necesitar todo de sus hijos. Este será el crédito número 06 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos, por su parte él se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas y así seguir siendo un socio puntual como en el crédito anterior que tuvo, durante el primer crédito conoció a sus compañeros de banco comunal y sabe que son muy responsables y solidarios, y es por eso que está muy contento de pertenecer a un grupo tan bueno.
Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, comprará mas productos como  galletas, caramelos, chicles, etc. para poder continuar con su trabajo, comprará mayor variedad de bebidas y aumentara su puesto de golosinas.
texts.en:
Saliz, 71, is a good, friendly and hard-working man. In spite of being of a mature age, he has no doubts about being able to generate his own income and not depend on anyone to be able to continue living. He is a widow and he lives alone in a rented house. He has two children who are older. He works a lot since he hopes to get some money together to be able to have a peaceful retirement. 

Every day, Saliz goes to the market closest to his house, which is where he has a small candy booth. He also sells charcoal and drinks. He is very active since he is always in constant movement trying to nail down some business with his clients. He has been working for more than two years and during this time he has learned that he has to treat his clients well so that they will always return. He works alone since that way he earns more.

His business is going very well for him. He has very good sales and this allows him to have greater revenue. He would like to expand his products and offer a greater variety of things and drinks to his clients. This is why he still has it in mind to increase his business and make it grow. He remembers that before starting with his business he depended heavily on what his children gave him, but he was always a strong and enterprising man. He decided to generate his own income so that he would not have the need to get everything from his children.

This will be his sixth loan from MFP, which is why he hopes for their collaboration in order to continue with his goals. During his first loan cycle he met his communal bank peers and he knows they are very responsible and unified, and that is why he is very happy to belong to such a good group. With the amount requested of 1500 soles, he will buy more products such as cookies, candy, gum, etc. to be able to continue with his work. He will also buy a larger variety of drinks and improve his candy stand.

loans.use: to buy products such as cookies, candies, gum, etc. to be able to continue with his work

loans.name: Djiguiya Group

texts.fr:
DJIGUIYA est un groupe de l’association MARIAMTON de KELEYA. Il regroupe 6 femmes qui se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté et de voisinage. Elles ont une moyenne d’âge de 50 ans. Mariées avec en moyenne six enfants, elles mènent différentes activités  telles l’achat vente de condiments et la préparation vente de galettes à l’image de MAIMOUNA qui est la seule personne habillée en robe noire de la photo. Elles vivent dans des grandes familles traditionnelles à KELEYA dans la  préfecture de BOUGOUNI (Région de SIKASSO, République du Mali). Elles sont dans le petit commerce depuis plusieurs années et sont très sollicitées dans leurs activités. 
Dans le souci de satisfaire le besoin croissant de leur clientèle, les membres du groupe ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso il y a six ans. Elles sont à leur quatrième prêt solidaire. 
MAIMOUNA, qui est la présidente du groupe et très connue à KELEYA, excelle dans la vente de galette à base de céréales. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter  4 sacs de mil et ingrédients.  Elle s’approvisionne à KELEYA et environnants  et vend ses galettes à KELEYA, en détail, au comptant et à crédit, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes.   
Elle espère sur un bénéfice mensuel de 25.000FCFA somme qui lui  permettra de rembourser le prêt et de réinvestir dans son activité.
texts.en:
Djiguiya is a group belonging to the Mariamton association of Kelyean. The group is composed of six women who know each other as relatives and neighbors. They average 50 years of age. They are all married, with six children on the average, and are engaged in various activities such as selling condiments and cooking pancakes for sale, which is what Maimouna does. Maimouna is the only person wearing a black outfit in the photo. The group members live in traditional large families in Keleya, in the Bougoni prefecture   (Sikasso Region of Mali). They have been in retail for many years and have a good customer following.

With the goal of meeting the growing customer demand, six years ago the group members have decided to join the Soro Yiriwaso loan program. They are on their fourth solidarity loan. Maimouna, who is the group’s leader and well known in Keleya, excels at selling cereal pancakes. She plans to use her loan to buy for bags of millet and other ingredients. She stocks up in Keleya and nearby and sells her pancakes in Keleya, retail, for cash and on credit, to a customer base composed of men and women. She hopes to achieve a monthly revenue of 25,000 West African francs, which will allow her to repay her loan and reinvest in her business.

loans.use: to buy condiments.

loans.name: Naheed

texts.en:
Naheed is a 29-year-old married woman and mother of two children. For the past five years, she has been running a hand-embroidery business. Naheed's embroidery patterns are very popular and are much in demand in her community. She has managed to consolidate a clientele that allows her to contribute to the expenses of her home. 

Naheed is requesting a 30,000 PKR loan to buy reels of threads in different colors along with packs of beads, sequins, and stones for embellishment. She will use her loan to increase her business, cater to more customers consistently, and target new customers. Naheed is in her third loan cycle and she has a good repayment history. In the future, Naheed dreams of a bright future for her children and hopes to provide them a quality education through all of her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to buy reels of threads in different colors along with packs of beads, sequins, and stones for embellishment

loans.name: Zaira

texts.en:
Zaira is 63 years old. She lives in Batumi District with her husband and daughter. Her husband is provided with a retirement pension. Zaira requested a loan from local financial institutions several times for family business start-up, but without any success. Her loan request was rejected all the time, because of low income and family’s poor living conditions. 

Zaira rents out a flat and gets monthly income. Besides, she teaches Russian language lessons. This is hardly enough for food for the family. According to Credo estimations the family belongs to the subsistence poor category. 

Zaira requested a loan from Credo to start up a family business. Her loan request was approved in the frames of new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. Start-up loan program envisages provision of business start-up and re-startup credits with soft conditions to country rural poor, which do not have access to credit products, being regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of low income. 

With the received credit Zaira will trade in used clothing. She plans to purchase used clothing from the wholesalers and then resell it at a higher price. This will increase the income of the family. The new business initiative, financed with the Kiva Start-up loan, will significantly improve the living conditions of the family.

loans.use: to buy and sell used clothing

loans.name: Amal

texts.en: Amal is a 39-year-old married woman and a mother of three daughters and a son. She started a small business at home selling women's dresses called 'abaya' in different styles. Now she is applying for a loan to help her increase the quantity she has and get new styles with different types of fabric.

loans.use: to get new styles with different types of fabric.

loans.name: Sameeha

texts.en: Sameeha is a 37-year-old married woman, living with her husband in a rental house. Since she has no children, she established a small beauty salon at her house by buying a few basic pieces of equipment. Now she has applied for a loan to purchase a special salon seat and to begin adding more tools to enhance her salon. She hopes that she can open a separate salon in the future.

loans.use: to buy a special salon seat

loans.name: Silver

texts.es:
Silver, de 26 años, es un hombre amable y emprendedor, convive con julia. Juntos tienen una hija de 02 años de edad. Él y su familia habita en casa de su suegro. El trabajo de Silver, consiste en la venta de abarrotes, como arroz, azúcar, menestras, conservas, siendo estos comprados interdiariamente en el mercado mayorista de su ciudad.  Tiene un dicho “trata bien al cliente, bríndale lo que necesita, ten todo lo que busca y volverá siempre” es por eso que no se descuida en tener de todo un poco para poder tenerlos siempre satisfechos, su negocio se localiza en un mercado muy concurrido de la ciudad, cuenta con la ayuda de su conviviente que siempre esta a su lado, lleva realizando tres años este trabajo.
Le gusta mucho su trabajo pues le permite tener tiempo para algunas otras actividades y obtener ingresos extras. Además de permitirle sustentar su hogar lo cual es fundamental. Tiene muchos planes a futuro pero lo principal es poder hacer crecer su negocio y así tener mayores ingresos. Este será es su segundo crédito con MFP, por tanto esta muy contento de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá seguro de avanzar con su negocio, además esta muy comprometido una vez mas en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en el anterior crédito que tuvo. Con el monto solicitado de 2000 soles, comprará mercadería para su negocio tales como pilas, linternas, jabones, cepillos, entre otros; para tener siempre lo necesario e incrementar sus ventas en el futuro.
texts.en:
Silver, 26, is a nice and entrepreneurial man. He lives with Julia. Together they have a daughter two years of age. He and his family live in his father-in-law's house. Silver's work consists of selling groceries, like rice, sugar, vegetable soups and canned foods. He buys these things on a daily basis in the wholesale market of his city. He has a saying: "Treat the customer well, give them what they need, have everything they are looking for, and they will always return." This is why he does not neglect having a little of everything in order to keep them satisfied.

His business is located in a very crowded market in the city. He relies on the help of his partner, who is always at his side. He has been doing this job for three years. He likes his job a lot, because it lets him have time for some other activities to make extra earnings besides sustaining his home, which is essential. He has many plans for the future, but the main thing is to be able to make his business grow and therefore have greater earnings.

This will be his second loan with MFP. He is very happy to know he will have financial support, since this way he will feel sure about advancing his business. Furthermore, he is again very committed to paying his installments, as with the previous loan he had. With the requested total of 2000 soles, he will buy goods for his business, such as batteries, flashlights, soaps, brushes, among other things in order always to have what he needs and increase his sells in the future

loans.use: To buy things like batteries, flashlights, soaps, brushes, among other things in order always to have what he needs and increase his sales in the future

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es:
Rosario, de 61 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora. Vive cómodamente en su propia casa en compañía de 2 de sus hijos: Eber e Iris de 22 y 28 años de edad respectivamente y su nieta Erika de 20 años de edad.
La actividad que realiza Rosario es la elaboración y venta de carbón a base de desechos de maderas de los aserraderos cercanos. Tiene un espacio cerca a los aserraderos donde apila sus maderas y los prende fuego dejando quemar por varios días quedando listo el carbón para venta teniendo varios pedidos por atender, logrando la satisfacción de sus clientes.
Se inicio hace más de 30 años, empezando de a poco con un capital propio que fue haciendo crecer con bastante esfuerzo, y hasta el momento lo realiza con el apoyo de sus hijos en la preparación y venta del carbón.
Considera rentable su negocio por las ganancias que les deja, así como la demanda que le permite vender todos su producción.
Decidió en empezar con su actividad por la necesidad de contar con un ingreso económico para sostener  a su familia, siendo padre y madre para sus hijos le era muy difícil, pero sola ha logrado sacarlos adelante brindándoles una educación. Por tanto, desea continuar con su negocio y mantenerlo pues es su único sustento. Este será el préstamo número 06 con la institución MFP. Está contenta y agradecida de saber que contará con un apoyo financiero para seguir avanzando con su negocio. Además de estar a gusto con su banco comunal, pues conoce  a sus integrantes y los considera ser personas responsables.
Con el monto solicitado de 800 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de material principal para la elaboración de carbon que son los desechos de madera buscando precios bajos por sus compras en volumen.
texts.en:
Rosario, 61 years old, is a hardworking woman.  She lives comfortably in her own house in the company of two of her children: Eber and Iris who are 22 and 28 years old, respectively, and her granddaughter Erika who is 20 years old. 

Rosario's business is the making and selling of charcoal by means of wood scraps from the nearby sawmills.  She has a space near the sawmills where she piles up the wood and sets fire to it, letting it burn for several days, remaining there until the charcoal is ready to sell, having several orders to meet and achieving the satisfaction of her customers. 

She started the business more than 30 years ago, beginning slowly with her own capital, that she made grow with quite a lot of effort and so far she carries out the preparation and selling of charcoal with the support of her children.  She considers her business profitable by the earnings that it affords them as well as by the demand that allows her to sell all of her production.

She decided to start her business because of the need to have an economic income in order to support her family.  Being father and mother for her children was very difficult for her but alone she has managed to get them ahead and provide them an education.  Therefore, she wants to continue with her business and maintain it as it is her sole livelihood.  This will be her sixth loan with the institution MFP.  She is pleased and grateful to know that she will have financial support in order to continue moving forward with her business.

In addition to being at ease with her communal bank, she knows its members and considers them to be responsible people.

With the requested amount of 800 nuevos soles (PEN), she will invest in the purchase of the principal materials for the making of charcoal which are wood scraps and search for low prices for her purchases in bulk.

loans.use: to buy wood scraps in sawmills.

loans.name: Mayja

texts.es:
Mayja, de 43 años de edad, es una mujer amable y muy ambiciosa. Convive con Denis quien es obrero y padre de sus 2 hijos. Juntos están cómodamente instalados en su propia casa que compraron a base de mucho esfuerzo. 
La actividad que realiza Mayja es la venta de comida, como juanes y papas rellenas; la  preparación lo realiza en su casa y la venta de forma ambulante caminando con una bandeja ofreciendo a los trabajadores de los aserraderos cercanos a su casa. 
Se inicio vendiendo mazamorras moradas logrando hacer crecer su capital, luego fue aumentado y cambiando a platos como juanes, logrando tener acogida y hasta el momento lo realiza bien. 
Considera su negocio bastante rentable por las ganancias que le deja y logra terminar todo lo preparado. 
Se decidió a empezar con su negocio por la necesidad de contar con un ingreso adicional para apoyar a su pareja pues los ingresos de él no les alcanzaba para cubrir los gastos del hogar.
Por tanto, desea en un futuro abrir un negocio de un restaurante pues le gusta la cocina. Este será el préstamo número 05 con la institución MFP. Está contenta de saber que contará con un apoyo financiero para avanzar con su negocio. Con el monto solicitado de 500 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de ingredientes necesarios para la preparación de alimentos como arroz, hojas de bijao, papas, entre otros;  para así tener un stock disponible y espera encontrar precios bajos por sus compras en volumen.
texts.en:
Mayja is a friendly and very ambitious 43-year-old woman. She lives with Denis, who is a worker and the father of her two children. They are comfortably settled together in their own home that they bought with a lot of effort.

Mayja's business is the sale of food such as tamales and stuffed potatoes; she does the preparation at home and sells in an itinerant fashion, walking around with a tray and offering food to the workers at the sawmills near her house.

She began selling mazamorras (a type of purple corn pudding), succeeding in making her capital grow and then switching to dishes like tamales. This business is well-received and doing well to date. 

She considers her business to be quite profitable due to the earnings it leaves her, and she manages to finish all the preparation work.

She decided to start her business due to the need to have additional income to support her partner, as his income wasn't enough to cover their household expenses.

She therefore wants to open a restaurant business in the future because she likes cooking. This will be loan number 5 with the institution MFP. She is content to know that she can count on financial support to advance her business. With the requested amount of 500 nuevos soles, she will invest in the purchase of the ingredients necessary for the preparation of food such as rice, banana leaves, and potatoes, among other things, in order to have a stock available. She hopes to find low prices for her wholesale purchases.

loans.use: to buy rice, banana leaves, and potatoes, among other things

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es: Josefina vive junto a su esposo quien se destaca por ser muy trabajador y responsable con su hogar, Josefina es una persona muy laboriosa también que cuenta con el deseo de poder mejorar la economía de su hogar. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva y usada las cual comercializa en lugares estratégicos como parques, mercados, plazas y así mismo de forma ambulante por distintas colonias y barrios. Con mucha ilusión de mejorar sus ventas y mejorar su negocio Josefina solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de fardos de ropa usada, así mismo para comprar ropa interior femenina, calcetines para niños, y variedad de ropa nueva para hombre, mujeres y niños.
texts.en: Josefina lives together with her husband, who stands out for being very hardworking and responsible within their home.  Josefina is also a very industrious person who has a desire to improve the economic situation of her household.  She works selling new and used clothing which she sells by setting up in strategic places like parks, markets, and plazas throughout different neighborhoods.  With great hope for improving her sales and thus, her business, Josefina is applying for a loan through INTEGRAL.  With this credit, she will be able to buy a greater quantity of used clothing as well as feminine undergarments, socks for children, and a variety of new clothing for men, women, and children.

loans.use: to buy new and used clothing for resale.

loans.name: Amal

texts.en: Her previous loan helped Amal to get a bigger kiln that allowed her to enlarge the pottery pieces she makes, as shown in this photo. She is now requesting another loan to purchase the colored glazes and special materials that she uses to make pottery.

loans.use: to buy colored glazes and special materials for her pottery

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a chuff cutter

loans.name: Nyamjav

texts.en:
Mr. Nyamjav, 24 years old, lives with his mother and two brothers in Ulaanbaatar, capital city of Mongolia.  The brothers have specialized in the construction field and in summertime they render house repair services to local people.

 Since 2012, Mr. Nyamjav has been renting a basement at an apartment and operating billiard and table tennis games there.  He is requesting a loan of 550,000 MNT to pay three months' rental fee in advance. As a result, he can operate his business without worrying about the rental fee. Even though he has just run this business for one year, he has already accumulated a vast amount of experience in this field.  Day by day, his income is increasing and the family’s living standard is improving. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who wants his mother to live happily.

loans.use: to pay the rental fee for the basement

loans.name: Tahreer

texts.en: Tahreer is 33 years old and a married woman. Her husband works as a driver to support his family. On the other hand, she sells blankets and bed covers at home to bring in more income for the family. Tahreer is applying for a loan to purchase bigger sizes of blankets and different qualities.

loans.use: to purchase bigger sizes of blankets

loans.name: Roxana

texts.es:
Roxana de 25 años es una mujer emprendedora sin compromisos conyugales e hijos de por medio tiene el desea de superación propios de su edad.
Reside actualmente en una vivienda construida a base de material noble cuyos propietarios son sus padres.
A su corta edad se desempeñaba como moza y posteriormente ayudante de cocina en un restaurante de su localidad optando posteriormente a iniciarse como comerciante y aperturar su negocio propio.
Comenta que le agrada el trabajo en el rubro ya que tiene vocación de servicio para con los clientes llegando a mostrar lo mejor de si fuera de adicionar que es un negocio cuya ganancia es rentable.
Pensando en iniciarse en un nuevo negocio desea iniciarse en el negocio de pollos a la brasa en una localidad cercada para el cual planea equiparlo del mejor modo posible ya que comenta es uno de sus sueños desde que se inicio en el rubro.
Sus objetivos a largo plazo apuntan a largo plazo apuntan a la apertura de otros locales y un vehiculo moderno para transporte de insumos desde las grandes ciudades para el cual muestra su total compromiso de trabajo y hacerlo realidad. En esta ocasión desea contar con 3,000 nuevos soles para el alquiler de un local y posteriormente  aperturar una pollería adquiriendo adicionalmente  mesas, adornos entre otros.
texts.en:
Roxana, 25, is an enterprising woman, who is not married and has no children. She wants to overcome issues typical of her age group. She lives in a well-built house owned by her parents. As a teen, she worked as a waitress; then she was an assistant cook in a local restaurant; and finally, she became a merchant and opened her business. She likes her profession because she has a gift for serving customers well. Moreover, the business is profitable.

She's thinking of opening a new roasted chicken business in a nearby space, where she plans to install the best equipment she can, a dream she has had since she started in this business. Her long-term goals are to open other spaces and to have a new vehicle to transport supplies from large cities, goals which show her work ethic and her commitment to making her dream a reality. She is applying for a loan of 3,000 nuevos soles to rent a space where she will open a chicken restaurant and to buy tables and other furnishings.

loans.use: to rent a space where she will open a chicken restaurant and to buy tables and chairs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase materials to construct a zero-grazing unit

loans.name: Cayetana

texts.es:
Cayetana de 52 años comparte una convivencia conyugal con Pablo de 54 años ambos tienen 3 hijos para quienes ofrecieron lo mejor de si. Poseen una vivienda construida a base de madera.
Desde niña siempre tuvo una participación activa junto a sus padres en diversas actividades agropecuarias como la producción de cacao orgánico, café y demás productos de pan llevar con el que gracias a ello aprendió el oficio familiar logrando adquirir parcelas en compañía de Pablo a propósito de su unión conyugal.
Al ser una actividad que desempeña casi toda su vida se siente a gusto con el trabajo que realiza puesto que según comenta no nació para otra labor.
En muchas ocasiones la temporada de lluvias son un inconveniente en cuanto al trabajo fluido que desempeña al hallarse sus parcelas en terrenos arcillosos.
En cuanto a sus parcelas optó por invertir en ellas gracias a los créditos de MFP logrando así realizar un trabajo fluido y obteniendo ganancias solidas con el cual hace posible brindarles a sus hijos una educación estable.
Como parte de mejoras en cuanto a su calidad de vida planea junto a su pareja en mejorar su vivienda a base de maderas de buena calidad por el cual acude a su entidad financiera.
Sus planes a largo plazo apuntan en acumular capital y adquirir un vehículo mototaxi con el cual espera seguir generando ingresos paralelo a sus actividades agropecuarias. En esta ocasión desea contar con 2,000 nuevos soles para la compra de una moto sierra para la extracción de maderas solidas y con el cual remodelar la fachada de su domicilio.
texts.en:
Fifty-two year old Cayetana lives with Pablo, 54 years old and together they have three children, whom they provided with the best they could.  They have a home made of wood.

Since she was a girl, Cayetana always played an active role in her parents’ agricultural activities, such as the production of organic cocoa, coffee and other bread products.  Thanks to this she learned the family trade and managed to acquire plots of land, along with Pablo.

Having done this work almost all her life, Cayetana is happy with it and comments that this is what she was born for.

On many occasions the wet season has been a problem, stopping work when she has found that the plots of land were like clay after the rains.

Cayetana chose to invest in plots of land following loans from MFP.  The plots allowed her always to have work and to have solid earnings that made it possible to provide her children with a stable upbringing.

As part of her plans to improve her quality of life with her partner, Cayetana has come to MFP in order to do work on their wooden house.  

In the long term, she would like to accumulate capital and acquire a mototaxi with which she hopes to earn more in addition to her work in agriculture.  On this occasion, she would like 2000 Nuevo Soles to buy a chainsaw for cutting solid wood and for remodelling the front of her house.

loans.use: to buy a chainsaw.

loans.name: Ruth Marisol

texts.es:
Ruth Marisol tiene 37 años de edad es viuda, vive con los cuatro hijos en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

La VRC 27 DE MAYO sus miembros se deican a la agricultura todos viven en el sector del recinto el Cadial Practicamente se han criado en esa zona se dedican a labores agrícolas u Pecuarias en su mayoria.

Ruth Marisol se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, fréjol gandúl. Solicita el crédito para comprar urea, insecticidas, líquido mata maleza, ranger. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para las siembras.

Las compras y las ventas lo hará en Ventanas.

El sueño es comprar terreno para superar y dar el estudio a los hijos. En el tiempo libre le gusta ver televisión y escuchar música

"Se cambio de Ventanilla por que tubo problemas con algunos integrantes".
texts.en:
Ruth Marisol is 37 years old and a widow. She lives with her four children in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos province.
The members of the rural communal bank VRC 27 DE MAYO work in agriculture. They all live in the area in the precinct of Cadial. They were practically raised in this area. The majority of them work in agriculture or livestock.
Ruth Marisol works in agriculture, cultivating corn and pigeon peas. She is requesting the loan to buy urea, insecticides, liquid weed killer and Ranger (herbicide). With the help of the loan, she will buy what is necessary for the crops.
She will make her purchases and sales in Ventanas.
Her dream is to buy land to get ahead and to provide her children with education. In her free time, she likes to watch television and listen to music.

She changed communal banks due to problems with some of the members.

loans.use: to buy urea, insecticides, liquid weed killer and Ranger (herbicide).

loans.name: Rufino Arnoldo

texts.es:
Rufino tiene 55 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos vive solo en el Recinto TEMPLAZA perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo Provincia de Los Ríos. 

Pertenece a la Ventanilla TIEMPO DE CAMBIO se encuentra ubicada el  recinto Templaza pertence al Canton Pueblo Viejo  se dedica a labores agrícolas y pecuarias. 

Rufino se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y la crianza de animales como pollos, patos y  también cerdos. Con el crédito podrá comprar insumos como: abonos, insecticidas para evitar las plagas, además alimento para los animales balanceados de engorde y crianza. Las compras las realiza en la ciudad de Pueblo Viejo. 

El sueño es comprar terrenos para seguir sembrando en los tiempos libres le gusta caminar por el campo.
texts.en:
Rufino is 55 years old. He is single and does not have any children. He lives alone in the neighborhood of Templaza, which is a part of the Pueblo Viejo canton in the province of Los Ríos. 

He is a member of the communal bank group "Tiempo de Cambio" (Time of Change), which is located in the neighborhood of Templaza, in the Pueblo Viejo canton. He makes a living working in agriculture and in animal husbandry. 

Rufina works in agriculture, planting corn, and raising animals like, chickens, ducks, geese and also pigs. With the money from the loan he is requesting he will be able to buy fertilizers, insecticides (to protect from infestations) and feed for the animals he raises, to fatten them up. He makes his purchases in the city of Pueblo Viejo. 

His dream is to be able to buy land to continue planting crops. In his free time he likes to go for walks.

loans.use: fertilizers, insecticides (to protect from infestations) and feed for the animals he raises to fatten them up.

loans.name: Segundo Alberto

texts.es:
SEGUNDO ALBERTO tiene 29 años de edad es casado tiene una hija, vive con la esposa y con el hijo en la ciudad de Ventanas provincia de los ríos .

La VRC ASO ACAMINANDO por un buen Futuro, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Cachely, Pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores agrícolas.

SEGUNDO ALBERTO se dedica a la siembra de maíz. Solicita el crédito para comprar insecticidas, urea, ranger y comprar una bomba. Con la ayuda del crédito podra adquiirir los fertilizantes y comprar la bomba para bombiar los cultivos.

Las compras las realizará en Ventanas. El sueño es comprarce un carro. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar boli.
texts.en:
Segundo Alberto, 29, is married and has one daughter.  He lives with his wife and child in the city of Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos.  The Aso Acaminando por un Buen Futuro communal bank is located in the Cachely district of Ventanas Canton, where people make a living in agricultural work.

Segundo Alberto makes a living growing corn.  He's requesting the loan to buy insecticide, urea, Ranger herbicide, and an herbicide bomb.  With the help of the loan he'll be able to get the fertilizer and buy the bomb to bomb the crops.  He'll make his purchases in Ventanas.

His dream is to buy himself a car.  In his free time he likes to play volleyball.

loans.use: to buy insecticide, urea, and herbicide

loans.name: Joel Basilio

texts.es:
Joel es un hombre de 25 años, es soltero, vive  en la ciudad de Chincha, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Joel pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Educación, en sus ratos libres le gusta dedicar un poco de tiempo a la lectura y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca para compartir con su familia.

Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Joel trabaja como Profesor en un pequeño centro educativo de su ciudad, él trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8 horas, él se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.

Joel se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la cubrir los gastos de trámites y documentación para obtener su título profesional, de esta manera Joel tendrá mejores posibilidades para ascender a otros cargos, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para salir adelante y lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Joel, 25, is single living in the city of Chincha.  He’s a very kind, hardworking, enthusiastic man who very much wants to improve.  Thanks to his efforts and support from his parents, Joel was able to study Education.  In his free time he likes to spend some time reading and sometimes cooks a delicious “Carapulcra con Sopa Seca” to share with his family.

On his own initiative and with much effort and dedication, Joel works as a teacher in a small educational center in his city.  He works every day starting very early in the morning and can work approximately 8 hours.  He feels good doing his work and thinks he does well because of the good way he does it and the kind way he treats others.

Joel is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help provided he will be able to pay for the paperwork involved in formalizing his professional degree.   In this way, Joel will have better opportunities for better positions and he will be able to continue working and striving to get ahead and reach his great dream of owning a house that’s his.

loans.use: to pay for his diploma.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.es:
Ruth de 48 años es una madre abnegada y orgullosa de contar con 3 hijos a quienes dedica todo su trabajo. Tiene por compañero de vida a Miguel de 48 años.
Es propietaria de una vivienda construida a base de material noble que construyeron de a pocos.
Desde hace 8 años viene junto a Miguel liderando su taller de vehículos menores que instalaron en el primer piso de su vivienda.
Miguel es el encargado de la reparación de vehículos mientras ella administra y esta a cargo de una pequeña tienda dedica a insumos del rubro con el cual llegan a formar un gran equipo donde el amor y el trabajo son los pilares de la familia.
Le agrada su labor puesto que siempre están en casa para sus hijos y la afluencia de vehículos es constante puesto que el taller que lideran se caracteriza por ser un negocio honrado.
A manera de realizar una mejora en la fachada de su vivienda en donde también se ubica el taller desean proceder con el tarrajeo de sus paredes interiores.
Sus objetivos a largo plazo apuntan a la construcción de un tercer piso e iniciarse en el negocio de alquiler de habitaciones a estudiantes y trabajadores de entidades. En esta ocasión desea contar con 3,000 nuevos soles para  contratar a un albañil y en la compra de cemento para el acabado con cemento de las paredes de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Ruth, 48, is a devoted and proud mother to 3 children, whom she dedicates all her work. Miguel, 48, is her life partner. She is the owner of a house constructed with solid materials, which was built gradually. For 8 years, along with Miguel, they have been running a small vehicle repair shop that they opened on the main floor of their home. Miguel is in charge of vehicle repairs while Ruth does the administration work and is in charge of a small supply store, with which they get to form a great team where love and work are the pillars of the family. They like their work since they are always at house for their children and the influx of vehicles is constant since the repair shop that they run is known as being an honest business.

To make an improvement in the facade of the house, where the repair shop is also located, they wish to proceed with plastering the interior walls.

Their long term objectives are the construction of a third floor and the start in the business of renting rooms to students and workers of organizations. At this time, Ruth is requesting 3.000 Peruvian Soles to contract a bricklayer and in the purchase of cement for the completion of cementing of the house walls.

loans.use: to contract a bricklayer and buy cement.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
Gloria de 32 años soltera y con una gran responsabilidad que es su pequeño Jordi de 6 años es una madre abnegada capaz de afrontar diversas situaciones de la vida como lo vino demostrando.
Actualmente reside en una vivienda construida  a base de material noble en calidad de alquiler.
Inicialmente optó por instruirse en alguna carrera superior, pero al cabo de unos años la llegada de su pequeño Jordi opaco temporalmente sus sueños llegando a tomar la decisión de salir adelante por sus propios medios, es así como desde hace 10 por influencia de sus padres se inicio en la venta de abarrotes y verduras. Al comienzo de su labor lo hacia de manera ambulatoria logrando obtener un puesto en el nuevo mercado de abastos de su localidad llegando a obtener mejores ingresos a partir de entonces.
Al poseer una buena empatía para con sus clientes logro convertirse en proveedora menor de víveres a diversos comedores populares de su localidad dándole una buena oportunidad de negocio que ayudarían considerablemente a su economía familiar.
A manera  de seguir abasteciendo con productos de primera necesidad acude a su entidad financiera y así obtener capital de trabajo.
Sus objetivos a largo plazo apuntan a la compra de un lote de terreno  y posteriormente cumplir el anhelado sueño de la casa propia. En esta ocasión requiere contar con 3,000 nuevos soles para la compra de víveres como arroz, azúcar y verduras para continuar abasteciendo a los comedores populares de su localidad.
texts.en:
Gloria, 32, is single and responsible for her 6-year-old son Jordi. She is a devoted mother, who has shown she is capable of meeting a variety of life's challenges. She lives in a well-built, rented house. She wanted to study for a profession, but the birth of her son Jordi put that dream on hold. She decided to pursue other means to get ahead. Ten years ago, at her parent's suggestion, she started selling groceries and vegetables as a street vendor. Later, she rented a space in a new local market, which resulted in higher income.

She empathizes with her customers, and she now is a retail supplier to several local and popular restaurants, which is a good business opportunity that helps her family financially. She has come to the institution to get a working capital loan to restock basic items. Her long-term goals are to buy land and later build a house. She is applying for a loan of 3,000 nuevos soles to buy staples such as rice, sugar, and vegetables to restock her store with the most popular items.

loans.use: to buy staples such as rice, sugar, and vegetables to restock her store with the most popular items.

loans.name: Ann

texts.en:
Ann is a 36-year-old lady, married to Nelson, and mother to two children, ages 5 and 2 years. She is a tailor. She has been in business for the past six years, earning a monthly income of KES 20,000.

She was introduced to KADET LTD by a credit officer. Now she has acquired her first loan of KES 20,000. She will use this amount to purchase fabrics for dressmaking.

She hopes to use the anticipated profit to plow back into the business, and to educate her children. She hopes to grow her business to a large scale.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics for dressmaking

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
Aida is a 44-year-old, conservative, married woman. She asked her husband to appear in the photo, in her place. Aida and her husband are supporting their two boys and one girl, with their work in their medium-sized food market.

Now Aida wants to improve their store by adding a freezer, so they can begin to sell frozen meat and frozen foods. She applied for this loan, to obtain money to buy the freezer.

loans.use: To buy a freezer, so she can begin to sell frozen foods in her food market

loans.name: Aalae

texts.en:
Aalae is from Iraq. He is a youth client, 23 years of age, who is married. Aalae is the only provider for his family.

Aalae is a car mechanic. He gained his experience by working for many years in this field, under supervision of a senior mechanic. He established his own business in 2010. He built a good experience in this field, and he is well-known in the surrounding area, with an excellent reputation.

Aalae is requesting an $1,800 youth loan, to pay the yearly rent of his shop. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits, so he will be able to provide his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to pay the yearly rent of his vehicle repair shop

loans.name: Tsismari

texts.en:
Tsismari is 63 years old. She lives with her husband in a small village of Sighnaghi district, East Georgia. The family runs an agricultural business. In particular, they have two pigs and sell meat locally. In addition, they have a hectare vineyard and sell grapes locally.

Tsismari is a very hard-working woman. She requested a loan for purchasing pigs. After purchasing additional pigs, they will expand the livestock business and sell more meat. This will increase the income of the family. With increased income, they will be able to improve their living conditions. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase more pigs

loans.name: Natheera

texts.en: Natheera is a 35-year-old single lady living with her mother and five siblings after their father passed away. Natheera has a small shop close to the house where she sells clothing items, home products, and cosmetics. Now she is applying for a loan to increase the quantity of cosmetics and perfumes that she sells in her shop.

loans.use: to purchase inventory of cosmetics and perfume

loans.name: Ingrid Vanessa

texts.es: Ingrid tiene 29 años, el esposo trabaja como técnico en contabilidad en un supermercado tienen dos hijos de 12 y 6 años que estudian la señora trabaja de asistente de primaria en un colegio privado en donde también estudia, ella ya es lic. en ciencias de la computación pero se sigue preparando para obtener más conocimientos para en un futuro optar por un mejor empleo con más ingresos económicos para ayudar a su familia, este primer crédito lo solicita para iniciar la construcción de la cocina lo que todavía le falta, comprara bloques, cemento, arena, hierro, piedrín, para poner bonita su casa y con mas espacio.
texts.en: Ingrid is 29, her husband works as accounting technician in a supermarket. They have two children ages 12 and 6, who are in school. Mrs. Ingrid works as a primary school assistant at the private school where she also studied.  She already has her degree in computer science, but she is preparing to learn more skills.  In the future, she hopes to get a better job to earn more money to help her family. This first loan is requested to start the construction of a kitchen, for which they still need to purchase cement, cement blocks, sand, iron and gravel, in order to make their home more beautiful and spacious.

loans.use: to purchase blocks, cement, sand, iron, gravel to build the kitchen.

loans.name: Khaled

texts.en:
Khaled is from Iraq. He is 41 years old, married, and has four children. Khaled is the only provider of the family.

Khaled is a barber. He established his business in 2008, and now he has an employee. He built a good experience in this field, and he is well-known in the surrounding area, with an excellent reputation.

Khaled is requesting a $2,400 loan to renovate his shop. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits, so he will be able to provide his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to renovate his shop

loans.name: Marhamat

texts.ru: Мархамат 25 лет, замужем. В поисках источника финансирования, в 2006 году Мархамат начала свой бизнес в животноводстве, стартовав с покупки дойной коровы. Благодаря упорному труду Мархамат, на сегодня ее хозяйство позволяет получать прибыль около 10,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. Благодаря доходам от бизнес - деятельности Мархамат на сегодняшний день имеет 2 голов быков и 10 голов овец. Для дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Мархамат обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы от кредита Мархамат планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья домашней скотины и улучшения благосостояния семьи.
texts.en:
Marhamat is 25 years old and married. In search of a source of financing, Marhamat in 2006 began her own business raising livestock, starting with the purchase of a dairy cow. Through hard work, Marhamat's homestead can pull in about 10,000 som (KGS) per month. Thanks to income from her business, Marhamat today has two heads of cattle and ten heads of sheep. In order to further develop her business, Marhamat appealed to Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy cattle. 

Marhamat plans to invest revenue from the loan to further increase the number of domestic animals and to improve the welfare of the family.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Marvin

texts.es: Marvin, tiene la edad de 46 años, está casado y vive con la  esposa y tres hijos. El con el crédito va comprar los insumos para la asistencia de café. El con el crédito comprara los fertilizantes necesarios para asistir de la mejor forma  y así tenerlo en condiciones buenas para la próxima cosecha. El quiere obtener de su cafetal  los mejores resultados y las mayores ganancias para su bienestar y cumplir metas que tiene planeadas para su futuro.. Es el primer préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Marvin is 46 years old, married and lives with his wife and three kids.  With this loan, he will buy supplies for coffee handling.  With this loan, he will buy the necessary fertilizers to best treat the land, and this way it will be in good condition for the next harvest.  He wants to obtain the best results and highest profits from his coffee plantation for his own well-being and to reach goals he has for his future.  

This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR.  He has not had any other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him this loan with more favorable conditions and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for his coffee plantation.

loans.name: Maria Adilia

texts.es: Doña María Adiia de 53 años es de oficio modista costurera, el esposo es albañil trabaja por cuenta propia así el ayuda en los gastos del hogar tienen 7 hijos siendo el menor de 17 años quien estudia y está a cargo de sus padres, de ahí los demás son todos mayores de edad e independientes a quienes con arduo trabajo los ha hecho crecer y ahora ellos ayudan a sus progenitores, el crédito lo solicita para invertir en telas variadas y accesorios para las costuras, las telas en su mayoría son para hacer uniformes escolares, esto le ayuda a mantener su clientela e ir mejorando su nivel de vida aprovechando esta temporada de apertura escolar.
texts.en: Doña María Adiia is 53 years old and is a seamstress by profession.  Her husband works as a freelance mason-construction worker.  She helps with the household expenses.  They have seven children, the youngest who is 17 and still a dependent in school. All the other children are independent adults who's hard work has made them grow and now they help their parents.  The loan is requested to invest in fabrics and accessories for clothing patterns, the majority of which are school uniforms. This helps her to maintain her customers, and continue improving her standard of living, while also taking advantage of the timing of the school opening season.

loans.use: to purchase various fabrics and accessories for assorted clothing patterns.

loans.name: La Amistad Group

texts.es: El grupo “La Amistad” es un grupo conformado por  06 mujeres emprendedoras que tienen en común seguir mejorando cada día. Amelia una de las integrantes, tiene  59 años casada con 06 hijos mayores de edad. Ella se dedica a la venta de frituras como pollo broster, hamburguesas, salchipapas en las afueras de su vivienda. Se siente feliz pues con su esfuerzo a podido apoyar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. Su mayor deseo es de poner un restaurante pues así asegura ella tendrá mayores ganancias. Solicito el crédito para la compra de insumos como pollos, papas, aceites, etc. El grupo “La Amistad” agradece a las personas que hicieron posible este crédito. Amelia es la primera del lado izquierdo.
texts.en:
The “La Amistad” [Friendship] group, comprised of six enterprising women, all have in common the fact that they are continuing to improve each day.

Amelia, one of the members, is 59 years old, married, and has six adult children.

She sells fried food like roasted chicken, hamburgers, and ‘salchipapas’ [fried potatoes and fried sausages] outside of her house.  She is happy because, through her effort, she has been able to help her husband with the household expenses.

Her greatest wish is to set up a restaurant.  This way she would be sure to have greater income.

She is requesting the loan to buy supplies like chicken, potatoes, and cooking oil, etc.

The “La Amistad” group is grateful to the people who have made this loan possible.  

Amelia is the first one on the left.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Ilhomjon

texts.ru: Илхомчон житель района Джиликул. Ему 27 лет. Он холост. Образование у него среднее. Илхомчон занимается растениеводством. Этим видом деятельности он занимается шесть лет. В основном Илхомчон выращивает бахчевые культуры. Он берет кредит для посева бахчевых культур (посева арбуза).
texts.en: Ilhomjon is a resident of the Jilikul region.  He is 27 years old.  He is a bachelor.  He has a high school education.  Ilhomjon is a farmer.  He has been in this business for six years.  Mostly Ilhomjon grows melons.  He is taking out a loan to plant melons (watermelons).

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Vafojon

texts.ru:
Вафочон житель города Дангара. Ему 34 года. Он женат. У него двое детей, дочь и сын. Его дети маленькие. Жена Вафочона домохозяйка, она занимается воспитанием детей. Вафочон имеет средне - специальное образование. Он по специальности сварщик. 
Вафочон вот уже три года работает по специальности. Он у себя дома занимается производством буржуек и печи, а также он производит металлические двери и ворота. Таким образом он зарабатывает на жизнь и обеспечивает семью. Вафочон берет кредит для приобретения материалов и необходимых инструментов.
texts.en:
Vafojon is a resident of the city of Dangara.  He is 34 years old.  He is married.  He has two children, a son and a daughter.  His children are young.  Vafojon's wife is a homemaker, she raises the children.  Vafojon has a high school-specialized education.  He is a welder.  

Vafojon has been working in his profession for three years now.  He manufactures ovens and furnaces in his home and also makes metal doors and gates.  This way he earns a living and provides for his family.  Vafojon is taking out a loan to purchase materials and necessary tools.

loans.use: to purchase materials and necessary tools

loans.name: Sayumron

texts.ru:
Сайумрон проживает в районе Джиликул. Ему 27 лет. Он живет с женой. Его жена домохозяйка, она воспитывает ребенка. Сам Сайумрон занимается садоводством, также он выращивает овощи. Этим видом деятельности он занимается три года. 
Сайумрон берет кредит для приобретения саженцев.
texts.en:
Sayumron lives in the Jilikul region.  He is 27 years old.  He lives with his wife.  His wife is a homemaker, she raises their child.  Sayumron farms an orchard and grows vegetables.  He has been in this business for three years. 

Sayumron is taking out a loan to buy seedlings.

loans.use: to buy seedlings

loans.name: Nolatuesha Ene

texts.en:
Nolatuesha Ene has successfully paid off her previous loan and her farming business is doing well. She has now diversified into animal trading and she has applied for a loan of KES 30,000 from Kenya Agency for Development of Enterprise and Technology (KADET). 

With the loan, she will be able to buy more sheep, cows, and goats for trade. She hopes to educate her children with the improved proceeds, which will improve the family's living standards.

loans.use: to buy more sheep, cows, and goats for trade.

loans.name: Natela

texts.en:
Natela is from Gurjaani district, East Georgia. She is 30 years old. Natela lives with her husband, George, her parents-in-law, and a daughter who goes to the local school. 

Natela runs a poultry farm and sells eggs locally. In addition, George is a truck driver and Natela’s father-in-law works as a car mechanic. They get monthly salaries. Besides her farming, Natela works as a baker at the local confectionery and earns monthly income, as well. The family income is only enough to cover the family's essential daily expenses. 

Natela requested a loan for renovation of the kitchen since it is in bad condition. After she renovates the kitchen, Natela will bake and sell cakes from her house and increase the income in order to improve the living conditions of her big family.

loans.use: to renovate the kitchen.

loans.name: Hussain

texts.en:
Hussain is from Iraq. He is a single, youth client of 21 years of age, who lives with six family members, three of whom are employed.

Hussain owns a small shop for selling electronics. He established his business in 2011, and now he has an employee. He built a good experience in this field and he is well-known in the surrounding area, with an excellent reputation.

Hussain is requesting a USD 2,400 youth loan to install a rolling shutter, an external ceiling, and signage for his shop. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits, so he will be able to provide himself with better living conditions.

loans.use: to install a rolling shutter, an external ceiling, and signage for his shop

loans.name: Aya

texts.en: Aya is a 23-year-old, single woman, living with her nine siblings. She is a university student, majoring in Arabic language. She applied for this educational loan to help her pay for her next semester and registration fees.

loans.use: to pay for her next semester and registration fees.

loans.name: Marie Noel

texts.fr: Marie est un femme de 43 ans. elle a ouvert un mini kiosque dans un quartier de la ville qu'elle gère depuis 02 ans. Elle y vend bonbons, biscuits, crédits de communication. elle sollicite ce crédit pour acheter des crédits de communication (MTN, Orange et CAmtel) afin d'augmenter son stock de marchandises. Ce qui permettra de réaliser un bénéfice non seulement pour augmenter son capital et activité et de satisfaire la clientèle. Elle voudrait, avec ces bénéfices, pouvoir subvenir aux besoins de sa famille
texts.en: Marie is a 43 year old woman who opened a mini kiosque in a neighborhood of the city she lives in two years ago, from which she sells candy, cookies and mobile phone credit. She is asking for a loan in order to purchase mobile telephone credits (MTN, Orange and CAmtel) in order to increase her stock of merchandise. This would allow her to make a profit in order to increase her sales and satisfy her customer's requests. She would like to use the profits to take care of the needs of her family.

loans.use: acheter le crédit de communication

loans.name: Karine

texts.en:
Karine is 33 years old. She lives with her husband and two under-age sons in Vanadzor city. Once a year, her husband leaves Armenia for seasonal work in the Russian Federation.

Karine sells food and household goods in her own shop, near her house. She has been engaged in this activity more than 12 years. From time to time, her husband helps her in the trading business. The merchandise for trading she obtains from providers and buys from Yerevan wholesale markets. For a woman, it is a hard activity, but as Karine said, she is satisfied with her business and, thanks to this activity, her social statement has increased and now she easily meets her family's needs. 

Karine asks from Kiva lenders an AMD 1,000,000 (Armenian Drams) loan to add to the number of her household goods and food for resale.

loans.use: to add to the number of her household goods and food for resale.

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en:
Mohamad is a 48-year-old married man, and father of three children. A year ago he retired from the army and opened a Hookah shop, to make his living and cover his family's expenses. He sells all the Hookah equipment and accessories.
Mohamad has a very good reputation, that's why his customers prefer to deal with him than with others.
Mohamad applied for a loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua, in order to increase his merchandise with special Hookah models and designs to attract new customers and to fulfill customers’ needs and desires.
He hopes to expand his business more and more to fulfill different customers’ requests.

loans.use: to increase his selection with special Hookah models and designs.

loans.name: Rukia

texts.en:
Rukia is 41 years old. She lives together with her husband and their three children who are in school. She is an active member of Yehu Microfinance. She owns a retail shop where she sells items such as toys, pens, buckets, and frying pans. She has had this business for two years, which has given her good experience as well as good profits.
She has a shop near her home. She is an enterprising woman with a strong will to get ahead in life and is always searching for new opportunities that might lead her to success.
Since she started her business she has been able to gain a wide variety of customers thereby needs to expand her business. That is why she has approached us for a loan of KSH 10000 to restock her shop and buy goods such as buckets, and wheat and maize flour.

loans.use: to restock her shop and buy goods such buckets, and wheat and maize flour.

loans.name: Faridah's Group

texts.en:
Faridah's group is comprised of 2 hard working women. Faridah is 21 years old and lives in the town of Bungokho in the Mbale region of Uganda. She is single and has 3 children who are all currently in school. For the past 3 years, Faridah has been working hard to manage her retail shop, which sells milk, bread, sugar and soap.

To help expand her business, Faridah has requested a loan of 750000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more essential commodities like milk, bread, sugar and soap.  This will help Faridah generate greater profits and pay her children’s school fees. Faridah hopes that in the future she will be able to build a permanet house for her children.

Faridah is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to buy more essatial commodities like milk, bread, sugar and soap.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
Cristina tiene 44 años y como compañero conyugal a Abel de 54 , ambos tienen la alegría de contar con hijos abnegados como Jhorlene de 20 años y Jhorge de 18. Residen actualmente en una vivienda hecha a base de adobe en calidad de alquiler. Como madre trabajadora optó por el oficio de la preparación de comidas en el mercado de abastos de su localidad.
Gracias al apoyo de sus hijos logra cumplir casi 10 años con su negocio y con ello brindarles a sus retoños lo necesario para una educación de calidad.
Paralelo aquello para aportar a una economía solida, Abel quien como empleado público logra también aportar ingresos mensuales para su economía familiar mostrando así el firme ímpetu por el desarrollo familiar.
